GV06apastgcu:575: atra prakṛtayorapi pavitrayoḥ punargrahaṇāt pāṇyoḥ prāgagratvamācārasiddhaṃ 'āṅguṣṭhopakaniśṭhikābhyāmuttānābhyāṃ pāṇibhyām'(āśva.gṛ.1-3-3.)
GV06apastgcu:577: tatastā apassamaṃ prāṇairhṛtvā prāmasthānabhyāṃ mukanāsikābhyāṃ samamudūdhṛtya uttareṇāgniṃ punastīrṇeṣu darbheṣu sādayati,
GV06apastgcu:591: tramuttarāsaṅgaṃ kamaṇḍaluṃ vā tatra kṛtvādhānyat kuryā (khā0sū01-1-26.) diti kalpāntaram /
GV06apastgcu:601: pitṛbhūtartvikpakṣe 'pi yaḥ piturbrahmā sa evātra niṣādyata iti niyamo nāsti //
GV06apastgcu:602: anye tu-śraute brahmā dakṣiṇenāgniṃ darbeṣu niviṣṭo dṛṣṭa- /
GV06apastgcu:603: tatheva bahvṛcānāṃ chandogānāṃ ca gṛhye brahmetyeva coditaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:604: ato 'trāpi 'brāhmaṇaṃ dakṣiṇata'; iti lakṣaṇayā brahmaiva codyate /
GV06apastgcu:607: na ca dakṣiṇato niṣaditasya brāhmamamātrasya brahmatvaṃ sūtrakārasyeṣṭam /
GV06apastgcu:608: yadi hi tathā syāt, 'yaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vidyāṃ vidvāṃsaṃ yaśo narcchet” (āpa.śrau.14-13-7)
GV06apastgcu:610: na punastriguṇaiḥ 'yo dakṣiṇata āste tasmai varaṃ dadāti“(āpa.śrau.14-13-9.) iti /
GV06apastgcu:613: ityatrānuktānāṃ mantrādīnāṃ parisaṃkhyeyaṃ ceti vadatāṃ coktirītyā svārtaparatve sambhavati doṣatrayayuktaparisaṃkhyāśrayaṇaṃ nirhetukam //21//
GV06apastgcu:615_1: teṣvadhiśritya jvalatāvadyutya dve darbhāgre pratyasya triḥ paryagni kṛtvodagudvāsyāṅgārān
GV06apastgcu:615_2: pratyūhyodagagrābhyāṃ pavitrābhyāṃ punarāhāraṃ trirutpūya paritre anuprahṛtya // ĀpGs_1.22 //
GV06apastgcu:618: athājyasaṃskāra- tatra vilāpanamājyasya yasminkasmiṃścidagnau bhavati uttaratrājyagrahaṇāt /
GV06apastgcu:620: punarājyagrahaṇamanāghāre 'pi karmaṇi saṃskāraḥ ājyasya yathā syāt /
GV06apastgcu:626: tatra dve darbhāgre pavitravatsaṃskṛtyājye pratyasyati prakṣipati /
GV06apastgcu:627: dve grahaṇamekaṃ ve tyasyāgnihotradṛṣṭasya vikalpasya pratiṣedhārtham /
GV06apastgcu:628: tenāgnihotrike 'pi tantre dve eva darbhāgre bhavataḥ /
GV06apastgcu:629: tatastadājyaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ paryagni karoti ājyasya sarvato 'gniṃ trirāvartayati tṛṇenolmukena vā /
GV06apastgcu:641: iti paribhāṣāsiddhaṃ vilāpanaṃ, tathāpi vilīnamapyājyaṃ homārthe 'gnau karmārtha punarvilāpayet /
GV06apastgcu:643: 'ājyaṃ vilāpya'iti prakṛte 'pi punarājyagrahaṇamājyasyaiva nirvāpādayaḥ na punaḥ 'dadhna evāñjalinā juhoti“(āpa.gṛ.22-10)
GV06apastgcu:652: dve darbhāgre aniyatāyāme tṛṇādyantardhāya chitvādbhissaṃspṛśya te yugapadājye prakṣipet 'dve'ityadhikaśabdāt, ācārācca /
GV06apastgcu:653: atholmukamādāyājye pradakṣiṇaṃ triḥ paryagni kṛtvā samantato 'gnimāvartya tadudagavatārayet /
GV06apastgcu:655: iti siddhasya punarvidhānametayornityamudagevāpavargaḥ na tu daive vikalpenāpi prāgapavargaḥ,
GV06apastgcu:662: avadeyotanaparyagnikaraṇāgnayostu yadā āyatanasthādupādānaṃ tadā tayoragnayerapavṛttakarmatvena laukikatvāt ttyāgaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:663: yadā tu nirūḍhāt tadā tadā tasminneva kṣepaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:668: yadi granthissyāt tadā visrasyādbhisasaṃspṛśya prāgagre agnau praharedityarthaḥ //22//
GV06apastgcu:673: yena juhoti tadagnau pratitapya darbhaiḥ saṃmṛjya punaḥ pratitapya prokṣya nidhāya darbhānadbhissaṃspṛśyāgnau praharati // ĀpGs_2.1 //
GV06apastgcu:679: tatkriyate darśapūrṇamāsayossammārjane ye dharmāsteṣāmiha prāptyarthamāhavanīye gārhapatye vā coditaṃ yatpratitapanaṃ tadasminnagnau bhavatīti /
GV06apastgcu:682: agnau praharatīti punaragnigrahaṇaṃ suksaṃmārjanadharmā iha pravartanta iti /
GV06apastgcu:683: pākayajñeṣu ca darvyā homaḥ, kalpāntare dṛṣṭatvāddarśanācca /
GV06apastgcu:684: yajayaṃ samāvartane darvyāmādāyājyenābhyānāyannityanyapare vākye darvīṃ prāptāṃ darśayati /
GV06apastgcu:685: yaccāyaṃ sakṛdupahatyeti upaghātaṃ sthālīpākāddarśayati tadapi nādarvyāmupapadyate /
GV06apastgcu:693: agnihotre āgnihotrike ca tantre yathā syāditi /
GV06apastgcu:696: yadayamaupakārye pārvaṇavaditi yatnaṃ karoti tat jñāpayati-añjalihomā adharmagrāhakāḥ yāvaduktadharmāṇa iti /
GV06apastgcu:700: yena pātreṇa darvyā sruveṇāñjalinā vā juhoti tadagnau pratitapyetyādi vyaktārtham /
GV06apastgcu:704: darvīnindā snuvavidhānārthā, na tu darvyā niṣedhārthā /
GV06apastgcu:706: tatra kevalājyahomeṣu ekaiva darvī sruvo vā, upastaraṇādyabhāvāt /
GV06apastgcu:707: carvādihomeṣu tu dve darvyau sruvau vā upastaraṇādyartha homārtha ca /
GV06apastgcu:711: darvyādīnāṃ trayāṇāṃ tantravaddhomeṣveva saṃskāraḥ, atantrakeṣu tantrāntargatadharmānupapatte- /
GV06apastgcu:720: iha ca sammārgadarbhāṇāmagnāveva praharaṇam, na punarvaikalpikam /
GV06apastgcu:723: ityādyatantrake 'pi karmaṇi āgnihotrike ca vidhau homārthapātrasyāpi saṃskāro yathā syādityevamartham /
GV06apastgcu:739: jñāpakārthantu, etat jñāpayati-vivāhādiṣviha saṃkīrtteṣveva samyāḥ, na tairatidiṣṭeṣu iti /
GV06apastgcu:741: pārvaṇādiṣu ca pakkahomeṣu tathā“evamata ūrdhva“miti vaivāhikena sthālīpākāditi darśanāt prasaṅgaḥ // 2 //
GV06apastgcu:744: vivāhādiṣu karmasuparidhyartheparidhānāṃ kārye paridhīnāṃ sthāna iti yāvat,
GV06apastgcu:750: atra vivāhaśabdena sthālīpākavarjitaḥ sāṅgo vivāho gṛhyate /
GV06apastgcu:752: sīmante śamyāvidhānādeva tadvikāre caule caulavikāre ca godāne samyāprāptāvapi tayorgrahaṇaṃ sīmantavikāre 'pi puṃsavane tāsāṃ nivṛttyartham /
GV06apastgcu:759_0: agniṃ pariṣiñcatyadite 'numanyasve ti dakṣiṇataḥ pracīna manumate 'numanyasveti paścādudīcīnaṃ
GV06apastgcu:759_1: sarasvate 'numanyasve tyuttarataḥ prācīnaṃ deva savitaḥ prasuve ti samantam // ĀpGs_2.3 //
GV06apastgcu:766: 'deva savitaḥ prasuve't etāvān mantraḥ kalpāntareṣu bhūyassu tathā darśanāt /
GV06apastgcu:767: bodhāyanīye ca vispaṣṭametat 'anvamaṃsthāḥ prāsāvīrit mantrāntān sannamayatī'(bau.gṛ.1-4.7) ti /
GV06apastgcu:778: atra 'deva savitaḥ prasuva'ityetāvāneva mantraḥ, narca ādipradeśaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:780: vaiśvadevakāṇḍe ekāgnividhāvevamovāmnātānāṃ 'adite 'nimanyasva'ityādānāmaṣṭānāṃ yajuṣāṃ pūrvottarapariṣecanastheṣvaṣṭasu vyāpāreṣu śrutisthānābhyāṃ viniyogāt,
GV06apastgcu:789: evaṃ cottarapariṣecane 'anvamaṃsthāḥ prāsāvīḥ 'iti pūrvamantrebhyo viśeṣamātrasya pāṭhaḥ na punarabahaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:801: paitṛkeṣu karmasu samantameva pariṣiñcati, na dakṣiṇata- prācīnam'ityādi /
GV06apastgcu:808: 'abhighārye'ti kalpāntaraṃ darśapūrṇamāsavadittyuttaraṃ paridhisandhimanvavahṛtya dakṣiṇaṃ paridhisandhimanvavahṛtyetyevamāditā vidhāne tūṣṇīmiti mantroccāraṇapratiṣaidha- /
GV06apastgcu:810: manasā mantroccāraṇaṃ tatra vidhīyata iti kṛtvā kāmyānāmādhārakalpānāmihāpravṛttiḥ prakṛtiviṣayatvātteṣām /
GV06apastgcu:812: anye punaḥ ubhāvapi darvyaiva vedopabhṛtorabhāvāt upayamanamapi na bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:824: anye-'tūṣṇām'ityārabhyedamekaṃ sūtraṃ ka-tvā hiraṇyakeśināṃ yomantraḥ 'ayaṃ ta idhmaḥ iti ,
GV06apastgcu:825: saḥ 'anuktamanyato grāhyam 'iti nyāyena nopasaṃhartavya iti vyācakṣate /
GV06apastgcu:830: 'uttaraṃ paridhisandhimanvavahṛtya... dakṣiṇāprāñcaṃ ṛjuṃ santataṃ jyotiṣmatyāghāramāghārayan sarvāṇīdhmakāṣṭhāni saṃsparśayakti (āpa.śrau.2-12-7)
GV06apastgcu:833: ityādi 'ṛjū prāñcau hotavyau tiryañcau vā vyatiṣaktāvavyātiṣaktau vā '(āpa.śrau.2-12-8)
GV06apastgcu:834: iti vaikalpikāstraya āghārapakṣā eva darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ tulyaṃ kartavyāḥ;
GV06apastgcu:835: na punardvitīyāghārasya 'pūrvordhe madhye paścārdhe vā juhuyāt'; (āpa.śrau.2-14-8)
GV06apastgcu:844: ucyate-yadyapi juhotītyevaṃ na codanāsti. tathāpyāghārayatīti dīrghadhā eguṇakajuhoticodanārthatvāt,
GV06apastgcu:851: iti gārhyaparibhāṣāmanusṛtya prāgapavargābhyāmudagapavargābhyāṃ vā dīrghadhārābhyāṃ juhoti,
GV06apastgcu:854: jevate tu darśapūrṇamāsavat prathamasya prajāpatiḥ, dvitīyasyendra ityartha- /
GV06apastgcu:856: anye tu āghārāviti nāmadheyaṃ 'māsamāgnihotraṃ juhoti'itivat aiṣṭikāghāradharmātideśakam /
GV06apastgcu:859: ityādiṣu sarveṣu āghāradharmeṣu tanmantreṣu ca prāpteṣu 'āghārāvāghārayati'iti parisaṅkhyātham /
GV06apastgcu:866: āghārayatītyatra ca sati gatyantare parisaṅkhyāyā anyāyyatvāt,
GV06apastgcu:868: parisaṅkhyāyāśca mantraparisaṅkhyāne 'pi sāmarthyāt tūṣṇīṃpadasya vaiyarthyāpatteḥ 'darśapūrṇamāsavad'iti padaṃ vyarthamiti svenaivoktatvāt,
GV06apastgcu:874: iti paribhāṣā, ata eva āghārasamidho rnivṛttiḥ /
GV06apastgcu:878: tenedhmasannahanaṃ paridhibhissahāṣṭādaśadhā, viśātidhā vā na punarekaviṃśatidhā //5//
GV06apastgcu:880: athājyabhāgau juhotyagnaye svāhetyuttarārdhapūrvārdhe somāya svāheti dakṣiṇārdhapūrvārdhe samaṃ pūrveṇa // ĀpGs_2.6 //
GV06apastgcu:887: kiṃ siddhaṃ bhavati ?āghārayorājyabhāgayośca sādharmya siddhaṃ bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:893: tena yaduktamuttarasminnapyāghāre sthānābhiprāṇane na bhavata iti tadupapannaṃ bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:901: samaṃ pūrveṇa āghārasambhedamavadhiṃ kṛtvākṣṇayā rajvā yāvatyantare pūrvo hutaḥ tāvatyantara evottaraṃ juhoti,
GV06apastgcu:904: yathopadeśaṃ pradhānāhutīrhutvā jayābhyātānānrāṣṭrabhṛtaḥ prājāpatyāṃ vyāhṛtīrvihṛtāḥ sauviṣṭakṛtīmittyupajuhoti |
GV06apastgcu:910: yasmin yasmin karmaṇi yā- pradhānāhutaya ityupadśyante,
GV06apastgcu:922: agniṣṭatsviṣṭakṛdvidvāntsarva sviṣṭaṃ suhutaṃ karotu svāhe“ti sarvaprāyaścitteṣu, (āpa.śrau.3-12-9)
GV06apastgcu:923: evaṃ tarhi etat jñāpayati pākayajñavidhirayaṃ anyeṣāmapi keṣāñcit sādhāraṇa iti /
GV06apastgcu:924: dṛśyate ca kālagireyāṇāmanena pravṛtti- vivāhādiṣu“karmasu“ye homāścoditāḥ teṣvetasya prāptyartha teṣāṃ kālopadeśārtamidam /
GV06apastgcu:929: atha yeṣvā 'jyabhāgānta'iti vā 'jayādi pratipadyata'iti vā vacanaṃ nāsti yathā paṇyaphalīkaraṇahome tatra prāptyarthemidamucyate /
GV06apastgcu:931: ājyabhāgānte jayādi pratipadyata iti vacanāt paṇyahomādayo 'pūrvā yāvaduktadharmāṇaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:932: idaṃ tarhi prayodanaṃ kavyāntaroktāni nityāni naimittikānikāmyāni vā yadyasmadādibhiranuṣṭhīyante tadā teṣvapi etasya tantrasya pravṛttiryathā syāditi /
GV06apastgcu:933: nanvetadapi pārvaṇātideśadarśanāt siddhamācārādyānigṛhyante iti;satyaṃ pakvahomeṣu siddhaṃ,
GV06apastgcu:936: vivāhādiṣu tantravidhānaniyamārtha yasmin gṛhamedhacoditāsteṣu atrāgnerupasamādhānādyājyabhāgānta iti jayādipratipadyata iti vā vacanaṃ tatraiva tantrapravṛttiḥ iti /
GV06apastgcu:942: śrāddhe vānupadeśanaṃ sthālīpāke ca bahirranupraharaṇaṃ sauviṣṭakṛtīmityucyate sviṣṭakṛddevateti jñāpanārtham /
GV06apastgcu:946: yathopadeśaṃ yena havirādinā vivāhādiṣu pradhānāhutaya upadiṣṭāstena tena vidhānena tā hutvā /
GV06apastgcu:961: vyāhṛtī vihṛtāḥ 'bhūḥ svāhā, bhuvaḥ svāhā suvaḥ svāhā'iti /
GV06apastgcu:964: devatājñānasya karmāṅgatvamapi“yo ha vā aviditārṣeyacchandodevatābrāhmaṇena mantreṇa yājayati vādhyāpayati vā sthāṇumṛcchati“ityādiśruteḥ,
GV06apastgcu:965: aviditvā ṝṣiṃ chando daivataṃ yogameva ca /
GV06apastgcu:968: ato yatrarṣe yādijñānānāṃ naivaṃvidhiḥ tatra tāni pākṣikāṇīti gamyate /
GV06apastgcu:971: yatrāpi sarpabalāyādau pārvaṇātidiṣṭaḥ sviṣṭakṛta tatrāpi pradhānāhutyanantaramevaitāḥ /
GV06apastgcu:975: nanu-yadyatyaiva sarvapradhānahomānantara sādhāraṇyena jayādaya upadiṣṭāḥ kimartha tatra tatra 'jayādi pratipadyate'iti vacanam ?
GV06apastgcu:976: ucyate-yatraitadvacanaṃ nāsti pārvaṇādau na tatra jayādaya ityevamartham /
GV06apastgcu:980: kiñca asminnasatitatra tatra 'jayābhyātānāni'tyādimantrasannāma ityante gururgranthaḥ punaḥ punaḥ paṭhitavyassyāt /
GV06apastgcu:982: kecit- yatrājyabhāgāntaṃ purastāttantraṃ tatra sarvatra jayādyuttaratantram /
GV06apastgcu:987: ājyahomeṣu jayādyanantaraṃ śrautavat tūṣṇīṃ paridhīnagnau prahṛtya tān darvīsaṃsrāveṇābhijuhoti;
GV06apastgcu:990: śamyāścet, asmin kāle apohyā;'atha śamyā upodya'(bau.gṛ.1-4-37) iti bodhāyanavacanāt, ācārācca //7//
GV06apastgcu:1016: atra śrautavat praṇītā vimuñcati tūṣṇīm;kṛtakāryāṇāmāsāṃ pratipattyapekṣatvāt,
GV06apastgcu:1020: atreyaṃ sthitiḥ- agnimidhvetyādi mantrasannāma ityantaḥ prācyodīcyāṅigasamudāyaḥ sarvagārhyapradhānahomānāṃ sādhāraṇaḥ,
GV06apastgcu:1028: upākaraṇasamāpanādīnāṃ tu tatra tantropadeśābhāv'pi 'kūśmāṇḍairjuhuyādghṛtam'ityāderiva tantrārthitvāvagamāt anena sādhāraṇavidhānenaiva tantram /
GV06apastgcu:1041: natu pārvaṇavadgṛha eva pratiṣṭhitābhighāraṇānantaramiti kramārtha eva /
GV06apastgcu:1042: kecit-kalpāntaravihiteṣu apārvaṇātideśeṣu ājyahomeṣu tantrārthiṣu 'kūśmāṇḍairjuhuyādghṛtam'ityādiṣvasya tantrasya prāptyarta yathopadeśamiti sāmānyavidhānam /
GV06apastgcu:1043: atratyeṣu tu vivāhādiṣu yeṣveva punarvidhānaṃ tatraiva,
GV06apastgcu:1044: nānyatra paṇyahomādiṣviti niyamārtha tatra tatra tantravidhānam /
GV06apastgcu:1055: pākaśabdo 'lpavacanaḥ, yathā-kṣipraṃ yajeta pāko deva (āpa.gṛ.20-15) iti /
GV06apastgcu:1056: pākaguṇako yajñaḥ pākayajña iti nirvacane ājyahomeṣu saṃjñāna syāt /
GV06apastgcu:1061: lokayanti vedairvedārthāniti lokāḥ traividyavṛddhāḥ śiṣṭāḥ dvijanmānaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:1063: teṣāṃ madhye saptānāṃ aupāsanahomādīnāṃpākayajñaśabdaḥ saṃjñātvena prasiddhaḥ,
GV06apastgcu:1069: ucyate-pākena pakvena caruṇā sādhyo yajñaḥ pākayajñaḥ ityevaṃ vyutpannasaṃjñānuvādāt nāntarīyakāvagataścarurevāgnihotrikavidhau haviḥ,
GV06apastgcu:1076: dvirjuhoti dvirnimārṣṭi dviḥ prāśnātyutsṛpyācāmati nirleḍhīti // ĀpGs_2.11 //
GV06apastgcu:1083: ubhayorvikalpastatretyucyate-yeṣu pākayajñeṣu āghāravatastantrasya pravṛttiḥ tatrāvāsya vikalpena prāptiriti darśanārtham /
GV06apastgcu:1085: tatra 'dvirjuhotī'tyanena agnihotrāhutyorubhayordhamaḥ pākayajñeṣu pradhānāhutiṃ sviṣṭakṛtaṃ cādhikṛtya vihito veditavyaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:1096: pakvahomeṣu sthālīpākaṃ sruksruvaṃ saṃmṛjya yāvatpradhānāhuti caturgṛhītāni pañcagṛhītāni vā samavadyati /
GV06apastgcu:1098_0: tataḥ paścādagnerbarhiṣyupasādya pālāśīṃ samidhamādhāya sarvāneva mantrān samanudrutya
GV06apastgcu:1098_1: sakṛdeva pradhānāhutīrhutvā prātaragnihotravallepamapamṛjya barhiṣi nimārṣṭi yadyahani karma /
GV06apastgcu:1100: tatassauviṣṭakṛtīṃ dvitīyāmāhutiṃ uttarāhutivajjuhoti-agnaye sviṣṭakṛte svāheti sthālīpākeṣu /
GV06apastgcu:1102: iśānayajñe tu karma tatra coditena mantreṇa /
GV06apastgcu:1103: tataḥ pūrvavallepamavamṛjya prācīnāvītī dakṣiṇato bhūmau nmārṣṭi /

GV06apastgcu:2351: kecit nāvā tār#a āpo nāvyā iti vyācakṣate /
GV06apastgcu:2360: cakārāt vadhvāstaraṇadarśanapratiṣedhaśca, varasya kevalaṃ saha taraṇamiti jñāpayati //2//
GV06apastgcu:2365: yadi nadī na bhavati tadā yā oṣadhaya ityetāmapi japet /
GV06apastgcu:2369: pāraṃ prāpya 'asya pāre'ityetāṃ vara eva japet //3//
GV06apastgcu:2371: śmaśānādhivyātikrame bhāṇḍe rathe vā riṣṭe 'gnerupasamādhānādyājyabhāgānte 'nvārabdhāyāmuttarā āhutīrhutvā jayādi pratipadyate pariṣecanāntaṃ karoti // ĀpGs_6.4 //
GV06apastgcu:2374: śmaśānabhūmeradhyupari vyatikrame bhāṇḍe bhājanādau rathe riṣṭe naṣṭe ratha iti pradarśanamanyeṣu caivaṃprakāreṣu darnimitteṣu vakṣyamāṇahomaḥ kāryaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:2387: yadidamagnerupasamādhānādi pariṣecanāntaṃ karma tadanantaraṃ naimittikamuktaṃ tat karoti /
GV06apastgcu:2389: anantaroktānāṃ nimittānāṃ deśakālabhedenāvṛttāvapi sakṛdovānte 'yaṃ homo bhavatītyarthaḥ //6//
GV06apastgcu:2400: kṣīriṇāmanyeṣāṃ vā lakṣmaṇyānāṃ vṛkṣāṇāṃ nadīnāṃ dhanvanāṃ ca vyatikrama uttare yathāliṅgaṃ japet // ĀpGs_6.5 //
GV06apastgcu:2407: dhanvanāṃ nirjalānāmaraṇyānāñca vyatikrame uttareṛcau yathāliṅga yasya liṅga yasyāṃ dṛśyate tadvyatikrame tāṃ japet /
GV06apastgcu:2408: tatra vṛkṣātikrame ye gaṇdharvā iti, nadyatikrame yā oṣadhaya iti, dhanvātikrame yāni dhanvānīti /
GV06apastgcu:2414: kṣīriṇaḥkṣīravantaḥ plakṣanyagrodhādayaḥ lakṣma cihnaṃ tatra bhavāḥlakṣmaṇyāḥdurgā tintriṇikā sīmākadambā ityevamādayaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:2415: nadyaḥ prasiddhāḥdhanvānodīrghāṇyaraṇyāni yeṣu grāmyāḥ paśavo na nivasanti /
GV06apastgcu:2417: 'ye gandharvāḥ'iti vṛkṣāṇāṃ vyatikrame, 'yā oṣadhayaḥ'iti nadīnāṃ dhanvanām /
GV06apastgcu:2423: atha svaṃ gṛhaṃ prāpya rathādavaropya yaddhanaṃ tasyā vahatutvenāgataṃ tacca gṛhān prapādya tatastayā tānsaṅkāśayatisamyagīkṣayati
GV06apastgcu:2426: saṅkāśayāmi darśayāmi vahatuṃ vadhvāḥ pitṛkulādānītaṃ dhanaṃ brahmāṇā maitreṇa aghoreṇa cakṣuṣā na kevalamaghoreṇa,
GV06apastgcu:2427: kiṃ tarhi maitreṇa gṛhairmadīyaissārdha gṛhaṃ ca madīyamityarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:2428: asyāṃ paryāṇaddhaṃ viśvarūpākhyaṃ yadābharaṇaṃ tatparibhyaḥ ekasmin bahuvacanam /
GV06apastgcu:2435: ityādau sahārthe dṛṣṭaḥ, tathāpi gṛhāṇāṃ jñātidhanasahitatvamevātrābhipremiti kuto niścīyate?
GV06apastgcu:2448: lohitaṃ carmā'naḍuhaṃ prācīnagrīvamuttaraloma madhye 'gārasyottarayā'stīrya gṛhān prapādayannuttarāṃ vācayati dakṣiṇena padā // ĀpGs_6.8 //
GV06apastgcu:2451: vimucya vāhau varaḥ pūrva gṛhaṃ svayaṃ praviśya yatra dampatyorvāsaḥ tatrāgārasya madhye camīstṛṇāti uttarayarcā 'śarmā varme'tyetayā taccānaḍuhaṃ bhavati lohitañca varṇena /
GV06apastgcu:2455: prapādayaṃstāmuttarāmṛcaṃvācayati 'gṛhāni'ti prakṛte punargṛhānityucyate- hatarathā agārasyāpi prakṛtatvāt praveśane mantraḥ śaṃkyeta /
GV06apastgcu:2461: tato varaḥ pūrva svagṛhān praviśya 'śarma varma'ityetayā yathāsūtraṃ carmāstīrya tato vadhūṃdakṣiṇena padāgṛhānprapādayanpraveśayan';
GV06apastgcu:2468: tāṃ prapādanakāle svayaṃ sā ca nātikrāmoditayarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:2470: prapadya gṛhān atha tatkālamaśanamaśnīyāt tato yasminnagāre carmātipadyate /
GV06apastgcu:2477_1: jayādi pratipadyate pariṣecanāntaṃ kṛtvottarayā carmaṇyupaviśata uttaro varaḥ // ĀpGs_6.10 //
GV06apastgcu:2480: uttarāstrayodaśapradhānāhutīḥ 'āgangoṣṭha'mityādyāḥ liṅgavirodhe satyapi vara eva juhoti,
GV06apastgcu:2484: uttaro vara ityayaṃ viśeṣaḥ sarveṣu homeṣu bhavatītyuktam /
GV06apastgcu:2499: athāsyāḥ puṃsvorjīvaputrāyāḥ putramaṅka uttarayopaveśya tasmai phalānyuttareṇa yajuṣā pradāyottare japitvā vācaṃ yacchata (ti)
GV06apastgcu:2503: ya pumāṃsameva sūte na striyaṃ sā puṃśūḥ'tasyāḥ puṃsvo jīvaputrāyā iti pāṭhaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:2504: na rephaḥ pāṭhyaḥ, paṭhyamāno vā chāndaso draṣṭavyaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:2505: jīvā eva putrā yasyā na bhṛtāḥ jīvaputrāyāḥ jīvapatyā iti ca draṣṭavyam /
GV06apastgcu:2507_1: aṅka upaveśya tasmai kumārāya phalānyuttareṇa yajuṣā 'prasvasthaḥ preya'mityanena
GV06apastgcu:2508: 'iha priyaṃ''simaṅgalīḥ'ityete japitvā tata ubhau tasminneva carmaṇyāsīnau vācaṃ yacchataḥ /
GV06apastgcu:2513: puṃsvoḥ puṃsvāḥ ityarcapāṭhaḥ yā puṃsa eva sūte na strīrapi,
GV06apastgcu:2514: yā ca sūta eva na tu vandhyā satī krayādinā putravatī, sā puṃsūḥ /
GV06apastgcu:2515: jīvanta eva putrāḥ pumāṃso yasyāssā jīvaputrā, na punaḥ 'bhrātṛputrau svasṛduhitṛbhyām'(pā.1-2-68)
GV06apastgcu:2519: evaṃ bhūtāyāḥ putraṃ 'somenādityāḥ'ityetayā vadhvā aṅka upaveśya 'pra svasthaḥ'iti yajuṣā putrāya phalāni kadalyādīni pradāya 'iha priyaṃ prajayā'iti ṛcau japitvā,
GV06apastgcu:2523: uditeṣu nakṣatreṣu prācīmudīcīṃ vā diśamupaniṣkramyottarābhyāṃ yathāliṅgaṃ dhruvamarundhatīṃ ca darśayati // ĀpGs_6.12 //
GV06apastgcu:2526: uditeṣu nakṣatreṣviti vacanāttataḥ prākū tasminneva carmaṇi vāgyatayorāsanaṃ paścādupaniṣkramaṇam /
GV06apastgcu:2530: varastu paśyan dhruvamiti nirdirśya pūrvā vācayati vascādarundhatīmittyuttarām /
GV06apastgcu:2531: tato vāgvisargaḥ mantraliṅgādeva yathāliṅgadarśane siddhe yathāliṅgavacanaṃ vikalpārtham /
GV06apastgcu:2533: tenottarasyāmṛci sarveṣāṃ saptarṣīṇāṃ kṛttikādināmarūndhatyāśca sahadarśanaṃ vadhvāḥ karma pakṣe bhavati,
GV06apastgcu:2537: uttarābhyāṃ 'dhruvakṣitirdhruvayoniḥ'ityetābhyāṃ yathāliṅgaṃ pūrvayā sapraṛṣayā dhruvamuttarayārundhatīṃ ca darśayati vadhūm /
GV06apastgcu:2538: yathāliṅgamiti ca jātakarmavaddvābhyāṃ dvābhyāmekaikaṃ mā bhūditi //
GV06apastgcu:2539: kecit- yathāliṅgamityatra nāsti, prayoktṝṇāṃ pramādāt pradeśāntaradṛṣṭamiha sañcaritapaṭhitamiti //
GV06apastgcu:2541: yathāliṅgaṃ vā iti bhitvā sūtraṃ sādhyāhāraṃ vyācakṣate /
GV06apastgcu:2542: 'sapraṛṣayaḥ prathamām'ityetayā saptaṛṣīn kṛttikā arundhatīṃ ca saha darśayati /
GV06apastgcu:2562: tataśca sa eva yadi devatāvidhiḥ syāt dvidevatyamidaṃ haviḥ syāt /
GV06apastgcu:2564: yadyapi vastuto giṇabhūtaḥ sviṣṭakṛdyāgaḥ tathāpi pradhānavat tatra codyate-'agnisviṣṭakṛdvitīya'iti /
GV06apastgcu:2571: tena yadidaṃ sthālīpākariveṣaṇaṃ brīhyādidakṣiṇā ca tat vadhūdhanasyaiva bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:2576: iti vidhānādāgneyatvaṃ siddham'; sthālīpākeneti tu śrapayitveti vidhānāt,
GV06apastgcu:2580: tena loke vyutpattisiddhādhyāhārādibhirapi yassūtrasyārthassampādyate so 'pi vedārthonuṣṭheya ucyate-dhruvamarundhatīṃ ca darśayitvā,
GV06apastgcu:2581: anantaraṃ yatrāgneyena sthālīpākena yāgaṃ karoti tatraivaināṃ patnīṃ yājayati patnyāmanvārabdhāyāṃ juhoti,
GV06apastgcu:2587: kecit- uttaratra na kevalamagnirdevateti vidhiḥ, 'agnissviṣṭakṛt dvitīyaḥ ityapi /
GV06apastgcu:2588: tena dvidaivatyo 'yaṃ sthālīpāko mā bhūta, kintvekadaivatya evetyevamarthamāgneyeneti vidhānam /
GV06apastgcu:2589: tenāgneya eva saṅkalpitasya vrīhyāderarthākṣipto laukiko nirvāpaḥ kāryaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:2590: 'enāṃ yājayati'iti tu nāsmin karmaṇyubhayoradhikāraḥ, kintu vadhvā eva /
GV06apastgcu:2599: arundhatīdarśanānantaramagāraṃ praviśya vrīhīn yavān vā navānagnaye saṃkalpitān nirvapati yāvaddhomāya brahmaṇabhojanāya ca paryāptaṃ manyate /
GV06apastgcu:2602: 'enā patyā'ityādivat sāvahantīti sarvanāmnā nirdeśe kartavye patnīgrahaṇaṃ patnīkarmedaṃ yathā vijñāyeta /
GV06apastgcu:2604: vadhūriha yajamāneti kṛtvā pārvaṇādiṣu patyuravahananaṃ prāpnoti //2//
GV06apastgcu:2611: kecit- patnītyārambhādavahananaṃ patnīkarmaiva, na tu yajamānakarma /
GV06apastgcu:2612: yajamānakarmatve hi sahādhikāre pārvaṇādau patyuravahananaṃ syāt, tasya tatra yajamānatvāt /
GV06apastgcu:2620: agrerupasamādhānādivacanaṃ tantravidhānārtha kālavidhānārtha ca pratiṣṭhatābhighāraṇānte kathaṃ tantraṃ pratipadyeta, na prāgiti /
GV06apastgcu:2628: na ca vācyaṃ brāhmaṇabhojanārtha sthālīpāko, homastvājyādeva prāpnotīti /
GV06apastgcu:2630: evaṃ tarhi śailīyamācāryasya-yatrobhayaṃ havirbhavatyājya ñcauṣadhayaśca tatra pradhānāhutiviśeṣaṇaṃ karoti sthālīpākādannādapūpādājyāhutiruti /
GV06apastgcu:2631: tena yatra viśeṣaṇaṃ nāsti tatraikameva haviriti siddhaṃ bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:2635: vivāhe ca 'yathā sthānamupaviśye'tyatra ājyāhutiriti viśeṣaṇābhāvādājyameva tatra dharmavaddhāviḥ,
GV06apastgcu:2657: homadarvyā sruveṇa darvyantareṇa vā sakṛdupastaraṇaṃ kāryam /
GV06apastgcu:2668: agnireva devatā pūrvasya homasya yeyamāgneyeneti vihitā /
GV06apastgcu:2673: tatra svāhākārasaṃyogāddevatāśabdaścaturthyanto bhavati -agneye svāhā, agnaye sviṣṭakṛte svāheti /
GV06apastgcu:2675: ityeva siddhe vacanamidaṃ kalpāntareṣu keṣucit mantreṇa pradānañcodita“mamuṣmai svāheti juhuyāt,
GV06apastgcu:2676: ṛcā vā taddevataye“ti 'puronuvākyāmanūcya yājyayā juhuyā'diti ca tatpratiṣedhārtham /
GV06apastgcu:2677: evamapi 'sthālīpākājjuhotyagnaye svāhetyeva vaktavyaṃ'sviṣṭakṛti ca sviṣṭakṛte svāheti /
GV06apastgcu:2678: idaṃ tu vacanaṃ pārvaṇātidiṣṭeṣu yathopadeśaṃ devatā ityatra mantrapratiṣedhārtham /
GV06apastgcu:2680: ityevamādiṣu yatra sthālīpākasya devataiva codyate tatra devatāśabdenaiva homaḥ,
GV06apastgcu:2689: nanva nvārabdhāyāmagnaye juhotī'ti vaktavye kimarthamadhikākṣaraṃ 'agnirdevatā svāhākārapradānaḥ'ityupadiśyateūucyate-śabdo devatā,
GV06apastgcu:2697: atra tu jñātakaṃ 'āgneyā iti tu sthitiḥ'(niru.8-3-7)
GV06apastgcu:2699: kecit- kalpāntareṣu 'amuṣmai svāheti juhuyāt ṛcā vā taddaivatyayā'iti vikalpaḥ coditaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:2713: na tu pūrvavaccaturavattaṃ pañcāvattaṃ vā apūrvatvāddarvihomānām //6//
GV06apastgcu:2729: tathā ca sati 'yathopadeśaṃ pradhānāhutīḥ'ityatra sviṣṭakṛtamapi hutvā jayādītyevamādi bhavediti // 7 //
GV06apastgcu:2736: “tena dviḥ pañcāvattinaḥ uttaramuttaraṃ jyāyāṃsam, na haviḥ pratyabhidhārayatī'(āpa.śrau.2-21-3,4,5)
GV06apastgcu:2750: nanu tatrāpi“pūrvār dhādvitīyaṃ paścārdhāt tṛtīya“mityetayordeśaviśeṣayoḥ pratiṣedhārtha syāt /
GV06apastgcu:2760: ityavadānasthānasiddheḥ etenopaghātapakṣe catiravattadharma upastaraṇādirna pravartate iti darśayati //9//
GV06apastgcu:2765: atrāpi paugoḍāśika eva homadeśo darśito vijñeyaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:2772: pradhānāhutibahutve 'pūrvā pūrvā sāṃhitām'(āpa.śrau.2-19-9) iti ca bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:2787: homagrahaṇe āśriyamāṇe uttarārdhapūrvārdha ityasya lepayoḥ prastaravadittyuttareṇāpi sambandhassambhāvyeta //14//
GV06apastgcu:2792: homopastaraṇādyarthadarvīdvapalepayoḥ pātraprayogārtha saṃstīrṇasya ca varhiṣaḥ pratipattimāha--
GV06apastgcu:2793: lepayoḥ prastaravat tūṣṇīṃ barhi raṅtvā (ktvā) gnau praharati // ĀpGs_7.13 //
GV06apastgcu:2796: yasmin barhiṣi pratiṣṭhitaṃ havirājyaṃ ca tasmāt kiñcidupādāya tadvarhirannasya cājyasya ca yau lepau tayoḥ prastarava ttūṣṇīmaṅtvā
GV06apastgcu:2798: ata eva pratipattividhānādapareṇāgniṃ barhiṣaḥ staraṇaṃ bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:2807: upaghātapakṣe tūpastaraṇāṃbhighāraṇārthāyā darvyā abhāvādājyasthālyāṃ madhyasya mūlasya carusthālyām /
GV06apastgcu:2809: tathā yayā homastasyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpanaṃ ca āgnīdhrakarma ca svayameva karoti //15//
GV06apastgcu:2812: lepayoḥdarvīdvayalagnayoḥ pātrāsādanārtha saṃstīrṇabarhiḥprastaravattūṣṇī maṅktvā tadvadevāgnau praharati /
GV06apastgcu:2821: anye tu ājyasthālīṃ dhruvāsthāne pakṣatraye 'pi kurvanti,
GV06apastgcu:2824: iha tu pakṣe lepayoriti dvivacanamājyauṣadhalepābhiprāyam, na tu pūrvavadāghāradvitvābhiprāyam //
GV06apastgcu:2825: kecit-kalpāntarādapareṇāgniṃ yasmin barhiṣi havirājyaṃ ca pratiṣṭhitaṃ tasmādvā,
GV06apastgcu:2828: kalpāntaroktabarhiḥ pratiṣṭhāpanopasaṃhārasya pākṣikatvena nityadvaddhakramamapi pariṣecanaṃ na nivartate,
GV06apastgcu:2838: anye tu siddhamuttaraṃ pariṣecanamitye kameva yogaṃ paṭhanto vyācakṣate /
GV06apastgcu:2839: teneha sthālīpāke pradhānahomānantaraṃ tantraśeṣasya prāptasya parṣecanameva siddhamanyadasiddhamiti /
GV06apastgcu:2855: tathā vacanābhāvādiha jayādyeva nāsti, dūre kramabalābalakathā /
GV06apastgcu:2865: yo dakṣiṇata āste sa iha brāhmaṇaḥ taṃ bhojayet vadhūrvaro vā //18//
GV06apastgcu:2872: bhojayediti balācca(vacanāt) homabrāhmaṇabhojanāyālaṃ ca ru kāryaḥ //15//
GV06apastgcu:2878: svakulādānīyartvije varāya dātavyā satī dakṣiṇā jāyāpatyoḥ anyonyadānapratigrahābhāvāt tadācāryāya codyate /
GV06apastgcu:2880: dṛśyate cāyaṃ nyāyo dharmaśāstre-“na pitā yājayet putraṃ na putraḥ pitṛyājanam“ityādyuktvā ''cāryāya dakṣiṇāṃ dadyurutu //19//
GV06apastgcu:2887: tathāpi tasyā bharturapi pravāse sahādhikāreṣu karmasu madhyaga dhanatyāge 'numatidvāreṇāva kartṛtvābhyupagamāt /
GV06apastgcu:2890: tena ca ṛtvigbhūto vara ānato bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:2895: atha ubhayādhikāravivāhasidhyarthameva vadhūranena pradhānakarmaṇāpi yāgena saṃskriyate,
GV06apastgcu:2897: tasmāt śūtraṃ yathopapannaṃ syāt tathā vyākhyeyam /
GV06apastgcu:2900: atrocyate-evaṃ tarhyadhyāhāreṇa vā vipariṇāmena vā vyākhyāyate /
GV06apastgcu:2902: yadvā ye 'sya śthālīpākayāgasya karturapacitastasmā etadyāgakartā ṛṣabhaṃ dadāti,
GV06apastgcu:2905: yo 'yaṃ loke vidyābhijanādisampattyā apacitaḥ tasmā ayametatsthālīpākakartā ṛṣabhaṃ dadāti /
GV06apastgcu:2908: evamata ūrdhva dakṣiṇāvarjamupoṣitābhyāṃ parvasu kāryaḥ // ĀpGs_7.17 //
GV06apastgcu:2912: ityanena prakāreṇa kṛtopavāsābhyāṃ gṛhamedhibhyāṃparvasu paurṇamāsīṣu cāmāvāsyāsu ca evamevāgneyasthālīpākakalpena sthālīpākaḥ kāryaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:2914: tasya ca“āgneyena sthālīpākena yājayatī“tyevamādiḥ tasmā ṛṣabhaṃ dadātī'tyevamanātaḥ kalpa ityarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:2917: tatra pārvaṇe vivāhanimittā viśeṣāḥ sakṛtpātrāṇi śamyā ityādayo na kartavyāḥ /
GV06apastgcu:2926: tena saṃveśanānte vivāhikarmaṇi niṣṭhite pañcamahāyajñādīnāṃ gṛhasthadharmāṇāṃ pravṛttiḥ /
GV06apastgcu:2933: chandogāścāmananti -amāvāsyā cet pūrvamāpadyate paurṇamāseneṣṭvātha tat kuryāt /
GV06apastgcu:2938: tasmāt parvasu cobhayorupavāsa iti prāptamupavāsaṃ prakṛtyaṃśenānūdya dvivacanena dvayoradhikāraḥ pradarśyate -upoṣitābhyāmiti /
GV06apastgcu:2945: ubhābhyāṃ parvasu kārya ityucyamāne parvasveva sthālīpākassyāt, upavāsaśca, nirdeśatulyatvāt //20//
GV06apastgcu:2949: ityādividhinā kṛtopavāsābhyāṃ jāyāpatibhyāṃ parvasu paurṇamāsīṣvamāvāsyāsu ca dvitīyāsudakṣiṇāvarja ṛṣabhadānavarjaevamevaṃprakāra etatsthālīpākasadṛśo homaḥ kartavya iti vidhiḥ /
GV06apastgcu:2952: yathā 'etasyaiva revatīṣu'(tāṇḍya.brā.17-8-1) iti, yathā vā 'māsamagnihotraṃ juhoti'iti /
GV06apastgcu:2953: tatra tu 'etasya''agnihotram'iti padābhyāṃ, iha tu evaṃpadeneti bhedaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:2955: satyam, nāsti codanāliṅgāt, vacanāttvatideśaḥ kena vāryate ?
GV06apastgcu:2957: ataḥ kalpātideśa eva;'śvobhūte 'nvaṣṭakāṃ, tasyā māsiśrāddhena kalpo vyākhyātaḥ 'itivaditi /
GV06apastgcu:2961: iti nyāyena prakṛtasyaiva sthālīpākasya 'evaṃ parvasu kāryaḥ'; ityādhikārāntasambandhavidhiriti /
GV06apastgcu:2962: etadapi na;evaṃ sati 'eṣa kārya'iti sūtraṃ syāt, 'natvevaṃ kārya iti /
GV06apastgcu:2965: dharmātideśe tu yathā nānvārambhastathoktameva 'athaināmāgneyema'iti sūtramatideśaviśeṣārthamiti vadatā bhāṣyakāreṇa /
GV06apastgcu:2966: atra ca 'ata ūrdhvam'iti vacanaṃ vivāhamadhye 'pi parvārambhārtham /
GV06apastgcu:2970: 'amāvāsyā cet pūrvamāpadyeta paurṇamāseneṣṭvātha tatkuryāt, akurvan paurṇamāsīmākāṅkṣedityeka'iti /
GV06apastgcu:2971: tasmātsāthālīpākānantaraṃ paurṇamāsī cet pūrvamāgacchet,tadā vivāhamadhye 'pi parvārambhaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:2989: iti vacanāt dhānyamuṣṭīnāṃ aṣṭāviṃśatyādhikaṃ śataṃ pūrṇapātram /
GV06apastgcu:2993: sāyaṃ prātarata ūrdhva hastenaite āhutī taṇḍulairyavairvā juhuyāt // ĀpGs_7.19 //
GV06apastgcu:2996: asmāt sthālīpākādūrdhva yāśca eto āhutī brīhitaṇḍulairyavairvājuhuyāt /
GV06apastgcu:3000: ete āhutī ityucyate- ye agnihotrāhutī āhitāgneste ete iti pratijñāpanārtham /
GV06apastgcu:3015: sthālīpākāntāditi ca sthālīpākaṃ vidhāya, 'ata ūrdhvam'iti vacanāt /
GV06apastgcu:3016: asya cārabbho 'nantaraṃ rātrāveva yadi nava nāḍyo nātītāḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3023: 'ete'iti viśeṣaṇādatrāpi dvitīyāhutiḥ sviṣṭakṛtsthānītyā aṅgamityarthaḥ tenetāṃ vismṛtya karmasamāptau neṣā punarhotavyā /
GV06apastgcu:3061: ityatra ca sarvaśabedona prakṛtaparāmarśinā prakṛtaśrautasarvayajñānāmeva parāmarśāt /

GV06apastgcu:3075: nanvismin vaivāhke dharmā āmnātāḥ pārvaṇasyāpi tata evātidiṣṭāḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3079: tena pakvaguṇeṣveva sthālīpākeṣu paśuṣu cāyamatideśo nājyaguṇakeṣu /
GV06apastgcu:3083: tena niṛtiṃ pākayajñene (āpa.dha.1-26) tyatraṃ patnīvatvaṃ parvaniyamaśca na bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:3085: vyākhyātānīti vacanāt vyākhyānameva pārvaṇenānyeṣāṃ karmaṇāṃ, na prasṛtivikṛtibhāvaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3087: ācārādyāni gṛhyanta iti vacanāt asmin śāstre a'nupadiṣṭānāmapi śāstrāntaradṛṣṭānāṃ pakvaguṇakānāmayamupadeśo bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:3097: iti pārvaṇaśabdādaṇpratyaye kṛte pārvama ityevaṃ rūpaṃ bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:3102: nanvevamapi śīghrāvagatasya nityasya pārvaṇasya prakṛtitye sambhavati kimiti vilambitāvagamyasya vaivāhikasya prakṛtitvamucyate ?
GV06apastgcu:3103: iti cetna, vaivāhika eva dharmopadeśapauṣkalyāt, itaratra tadabhāvācca /
GV06apastgcu:3107: asya ca vaivāhikasya pārvaṇaśabdāvācyatvaṃ dharmasāstre vyaktameva /
GV06apastgcu:3119: nanvatra kecit- 'yaccainayoḥ priyaṃ syāttadetasminnahami'ityetacchabdenaikavacanāntena 'parsu ca'iti bahivacanāntanirdiṣṭaparvāhaḥ parāmarśānupapatteḥ,
GV06apastgcu:3124: tasya ca ka4māntarasyopacāraḥ pārvaṇena nityena vyākhyāta ityāhuḥ tatkathaṃ dharmaśāstre vyaketaṃ vaivāhikasya pārvaṇaśabdavācyatvamiti /
GV06apastgcu:3125: tanna;yato 'tra vratameva paramaprakṛtam, pāṇigrahaṇasya tu tadavadhitayā kīrtanamātram /
GV06apastgcu:3127: gamyamānaṃ caitacchabdena parāmraṣṭuṃ priyabhojanādinā viśeṣayituṃ ca nārham /
GV06apastgcu:3132: ataścātra 'parvasu ca'ityuddeśyagatabahutvasyāvivakṣitatvāt śrutāvyavahitasya prakṛtasyaparvāhasyaiva parāmarśo viśeṣaṇaṃ ca yuktam /
GV06apastgcu:3134: 'upoṣitābhyām parvasu kāryaḥ'iti gṛhyavihitasya sthālīpākasyānuvāda eva, na karmāntarasya vidhiḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3135: anuvāde ca tasyopacāra iti dūrasyasya parāmarśo ghaṭate /
GV06apastgcu:3138: tathāpi yasyeme vidhīyamānā upavāsapriyabhojanādayo dharmāssambandhinastasyopacāraḥ pārvamena vyākhyāta iti sādhyāhāramevedaṃ sūtraṃ vyākhyeyam /
GV06apastgcu:3144: atra ca ato 'nyānītyāha-etatsadṛśānyevauṣadhapradhānahavīṃṣi sarpabalyādīni karmāṇyanena vyākhyātāni,
GV06apastgcu:3145: na tvanena tatsadṛśāni paśuprabhavapradhānahavīṃṣi vapāhomādīnīti vaktum /
GV06apastgcu:3150: auṣadhāni havīmaṣi paśuprabhavāni ca kāni katidhā ca ?iti
GV06apastgcu:3174: .iti prakṛte 'pyatra punarvacanaṃ gṛhyapraśne 'nuktānāṃ mahārājasthālīpāka gaṇahomādīnāmetadvikṛtitvaṃ vaktapam /
GV06apastgcu:3178: ucyate-yadyapi śrautaāprayaṇe vaiśvadevādīnāṃ bhūyastvena paurṇamāsatantrāśaṅkāyāṃ aindrāgnasya mukhyatvāt 'mukhyaṃ vā pūrvacodanāllokavat'(jai.sū.12-2-23)
GV06apastgcu:3181: tathāpyatrānyeṣāṃ haviṣāṃ bahutve 'pyauṣadhasya mukhyatvāt pārvaṇatantrataiveti mukhyanyāyaṃ mandabuddhihitārtha darśayitumeva punaścoktaṃ 'pārvaṇavadājyabhāgānte'iti /
GV06apastgcu:3182: tena māsiśrāddhe aṣṭakākarmaṇi ca pārvaṇameva tantram /
GV06apastgcu:3187: iti punarvacanamapūpamāṃsaudanapiṣṭānnahomānāṃ sthāne anukalpena vihitasyauṣadhahaviṣkasyāpi dadhihomasya pārvaṇatantraprāptiṃ jñāpayitum,
GV06apastgcu:3190: yathā 'yasya haviṣevatsā apākṛtā dhayeyustatsthāne vāyavyāṃ yavāgūṃ nirvapet'(āpa.śrau.9-1-23)
GV06apastgcu:3192: kecit-nityasya pārvaṇasya yaḥ kalpassa eva sarveṣāṃ yajñānāṃ kalpaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3193: yadyapi vāvāhikedharmāmnānaṃ, tathāpi nityasyaiva kalpādideso 'dakṣiṇāvarja'ityasya parigrahārthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3194: ato 'nyānīti vacanādetatsadṛśānāṃ pakvaguṇānāmeva sthālīpākānāṃ paśūnāṃ cāyaṃ vikalpo,
GV06apastgcu:3196: karmāṇīti vacanāt karmamātrasyaiva vyākhyānaṃ, na tu kartṛtaddharmakālādīnām /
GV06apastgcu:3198: ityatra paśau na patnīvattvam nāpi hṛdayasaṃsargādiṣu parvaṇo niyamaḥ,
GV06apastgcu:3203: etadgṛhyopadiṣṭeṣu yatra vacanaṃ tatraiva tantraṃ, nānyatra /
GV06apastgcu:3205: yata upadiṣṭadharmakasya vaivāhikasya dharmātideśe 'pi naiva doṣaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3209: dakṣiṇābhāvastu prayojanaṃ tasya 'yo 'syāpacitastasmā ṛṣabhaṃ dadāti'(āpa.gṛ.7-16) iti siddham /
GV06apastgcu:3213: 'etena vaiśvasṛjā jyo vyākhyātaḥ (āpa.śrau.19-15-1) ityādau prakṛtivikṛtitvasya dṛṣṭatvāt /
GV06apastgcu:3214: tathā naikasminnāgrayaṇe tantralopaphalārtha niyamārthāni bahūni sūtrāṇyārabdhavyāni /
GV06apastgcu:3224: tena pārvaṇe ye devate yasca sthālīpākaḥ teṣāṃ sarveṣu karmasu pravṛttiḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3225: tatra tatrepadiṣṭābhistu devatābhiḥ pārvaṇadevatayoḥ bādhe prāpte tannivṛttyartha vacanaṃ tatra coditānāṃ devatānāṃ deśavidhānārthañca-yo 'yamagniḥ pārvaṇoyaśca sviṣṭakṛt,
GV06apastgcu:3226: tāvantareṇa tayormadhye tā devatā yaṣṭavyā iti /
GV06apastgcu:3227: tatra pārvaṇasyāgneḥ pārvaṇameva haviḥ tatra tatra vihitānāṃ tatra tatra vihitam /
GV06apastgcu:3229: anye tu tatra vihitādeva haviṣaḥ pārvaṇadevatayorapījyāmicchanti /
GV06apastgcu:3230: apara īha- nātra pārdevate anūrdyate agniśca sviṣṭakṛcca /
GV06apastgcu:3231: kiṃ tarhi ?āgantuke ete anenaiva vacanena vidhīyete /
GV06apastgcu:3236: tathā ca śrauteṣu 'yena yajñenetrset kuryādeva tatrāgneyamiti /
GV06apastgcu:3238: pārvaṇavyākhyāteṣu sarveṣveva karmasu yathopadeśaṃ devatā yajati agniṃ sviṣṭakṛtaṃ ca yajati yoyamagnisviṣṭakṛt pārvaṇe dvitīyo devatāviśeṣaḥ taṃ ca yajati tasmādeva haviṣaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3241: asati samuccaye teṣu tasya pravṛttirna syāt /
GV06apastgcu:3244: antareṇa ityanena tu tasyaiva sviṣṭakṛto deśo niyamyate-pradhānāhutīṣṭopahomāṃścāntaraṇogniṃ sviṣṭakṛtaṃ yajatīti /
GV06apastgcu:3246: 'ājyāhutīruttarāḥ jayādu pratipadyata'iti ca kramaparaṃ vacanaṃ tatrāpi nityamagnisviṣṭakṛdasminnantarāle yaṣṭavyo bhavatīti /
GV06apastgcu:3252: yathopadeśaṃ sarpavalyādiṣu yāśca yāvatyaśca yena yena prakāreṇa mantravidhānādinopadṣṭāṃ devatāstā eva bhavanti,
GV06apastgcu:3253: na pārvaṇadevatāḥ na teṣu pārvaṇaṃ pradhānaṃ samuccetavyā ityarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3254: nanu vikṛtāvupakāramukhena tajjanakānāṃ dharmāṇāmatideśa-, pradhānaṃ copakārya, nopakārajanakam /
GV06apastgcu:3255: pārvaṇe ca sthālīpākahomayoḥ prathamo homaḥ pradhānam /
GV06apastgcu:3263: kintu gārhyakarmānuṣṭhātṝṇāṃ madhye ye mandabuddhayo 'ṅgapradhānayoratideśyānatideśyayośca anabhijñāste pārvaṇenetya viśeṣeṇātideśaprātibhāsāt 'ṣaḍibhirdīkṣayati,
GV06apastgcu:3268: yathopadeśaṃ devatāḥ ye vikṛtāvupadiṣṭāḥ te agniṃ sviṣṭakṛtaṃ cāntareṇa āgneya sauviṣṭakṛtayorhomayormadhye bhaveyuḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3272_0: vibhaktasya sūtrasya cāyaṃ vivakṣitor'thaḥ- sarveṣu tantravatsvauṣadhahomeṣu dadhihomeṣu
GV06apastgcu:3274: sarvatra sviṣṭakṛtaśśeṣapratipattyarthatvāt svata evāsāvante eva bhavatīti /
GV06apastgcu:3278: tathāgnimiti cobhayebhyaḥ pradhānāhutibhiyaḥ pūrvamevāgnimukhamityevamartha sviṣṭakṛdvanniyama iti //
GV06apastgcu:3279: kecit- 'yathopadeśaṃ devatā agniṃ sviṣṭakṛtaṃ ca'ityevamantamekaṃ sūtram /
GV06apastgcu:3280: tasyārthaḥ- 'agnissviṣṭakṛt dvitīyaḥ'(āpa.gṛ.7-70 ityatra sviṣṭakṛtaḥ pradhānahomatulyadharmatvajñāpanāt vikṛtiṣu ca pārvaṇapradhānalope sati tasyāpi lopassyāt,
GV06apastgcu:3282: agniṃ sviṣṭakṛtaṃ ca kuryāt iti tāsu tasya samuccayo vidhīyate /
GV06apastgcu:3284: prakaraṇādvaikṛtapradhānahomānāṃ jayādīnāṃ ca madhye sarvāsvapi vikṛtiṣu sviṣṭakṛnnitya evetyarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3285: itarathā kvacittasya lepaḥ syāt, 'sthālīpākāduttarā āhutīrhutvā jayādi pratipadyate'(āpa.gṛ.9-4)
GV06apastgcu:3289: ityetayoḥ antareṇetyanena sambandhākāṅkṣeṇa ekavākyatve sambhavati vākyabhedasyāyuktatvāt,
GV06apastgcu:3294: vyartha caitat;svamate sviṣṭakṛtassamuccayavidhānādeva tridoṣāyāḥ parisaṅkhyāyā api nirastatvāt,
GV06apastgcu:3299: yā gauratithaya ālabhyate 'gauriti gāṃ prāheti'tadātithyaṃ nāmakarmatadavikṛtamapūrva pārvaṇadharmāstadvapāhome na kartavyā ityarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3305: atithiryasya karmaṇo nimittaṃ tadātithyam, gavālambha ityarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3309: pārvaṇaṃ tu dūre;'kṛtsnavidhānāt yajaterapūrvatvam'(jai.sū.8-1-5) iti nyāyāt /
GV06apastgcu:3310: 'kṛtsnavidhānaṃ ca tasyai vapāṃ śrapayitvopastīrṇābhighāritāṃ madhyamekonnātamena vā palāśaparṇenottarayā juhoti'(āpa.gṛ.22-4) iti /
GV06apastgcu:3315: agnau homeṣu ca āgneyasauviṣṭakṛtāvantareṇa ye homāsta eva pradhānāḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3321: 'āryāḥ prayatā vaiśvadeva'iti codite vaiśvadevākhye karmaṇi devatopadeśo 'yaṃ nirvāpakāle saṅkalpārtham /
GV06apastgcu:3324: tena viśvebhyo devebhyaḥ iti saṅkalpya gṛhasthena svagṛhe pākaḥ kāryaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3325: tathā pakvādevānnāt homā balayaśca tasyai tasyai devatāyai /
GV06apastgcu:3328: tasmāt na pṛthak pañcamahāyajñāḥ kartavyāḥ tatraiva vaiśvadevam yadagnau kriyate sa devayajñaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3332: tatra vaiśvadeve somāya svāheti dvitīyāhutiriti mantravyākhyākāreṇoktam /
GV06apastgcu:3336: ucyate-ihopadeśe tasya kalpasya sarvacaraṇārthatā na syāt, iṣyate ca /
GV06apastgcu:3338: atha taṃhi devatopadeśaḥ tatraiva kasmānna kṛtaḥ ?
GV06apastgcu:3339: ihopadeśaprayojanamasmin gṛhye tadapi vaiśvadevaṃ karmopadiṣṭaṃ yathā syāditi /
GV06apastgcu:3340: tenāsmadīyānāṃ sa eva vaiśvadevakalpo nānyeṣu dharmaśāstreṣu coditaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3345: pravṛttinimittaṃ ca, viśve sarve devā atrejyanta iti /
GV06apastgcu:3347: āgneyādayaṣṣaḍapi homāḥ baliharaṇāni cānagnideśyānyapi sarvāṇyeva pradhānāni;
GV06apastgcu:3350: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ-yādinānagnau pradhānam, kintu śeṣa eveti tarhye taccheṣalakṣaṇe tṛtīyādhyāye dṛśyeta /
GV06apastgcu:3351: na tu dṛṣṭam, nāpi sūtrakārektaṃ dṛśyate /
GV06apastgcu:3352: kintu puṇḍapitṛyajñe tāvadāpastambena hemaḥ piṇḍadānaṃ cobhayaṃ pradhānamuktam,
GV06apastgcu:3356: yadi hi piṇḍadānasyāṅgatā, tadā pradhānabhūtahomānuṣṭhāne sati, tasyāpyanuṣṭhānaṃ syāt, na virāmaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3368: 'yadi vapā haviravadānaṃ vā skandet'(āpa.śrau.9-18-15) iti vapāyāḥ pṛthaggrahaṇāt /
GV06apastgcu:3370: 'aupāsane pacane vā ṣaḍbhirādyaiḥ pratimantraṃ hastena juhuyāt'(āpa.dha.2-3-17)
GV06apastgcu:3373: kiñca vaiśvadevamantreṣvapi 'agnaye svāhā, agnaye sviṣṭakṛte svāhā'ityetayorapyāmnānāt prādhānyam /
GV06apastgcu:3379: sarvaprādhānye ca prayojanam-eṣāmekataramapyakṛtvā prayoge samāpite 'pi tat prāgbhojanāt saprāyaścittaṃ sāṅgamanuṣṭheyam;
GV06apastgcu:3381: kecit-vaiśvadeve viśve devā devatā vidhīyante nirvāpakāle saṅkalpārtham, īśānayajñavat /
GV06apastgcu:3382: yāstu dharmaśāstre mantraviniyogāt kalpitāstāḥ pradānakāle devatāḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3385: idaṃ ca vaiśvadevaṃ na pañcamahāyajñebhyaḥ pṛthagbhūtam /
GV06apastgcu:3393: svamate śrutyā coditān viśvān devān vacanaṃ vināpanīya,
GV06apastgcu:3394: tebhyassaṅkalpitasya haviṣo devatāntarebhyo mantravarṇāt kalpitebhyo dātumayuktatvāt /
GV06apastgcu:3398_0: yattu mīḍhuṣyai jayantāya cāsmāt sthālīpākāddānaṃ tadapyabhyudayeṣṭyādivat savanīyapuroḍāśavacca
GV06apastgcu:3399: iti vacanaiḥ sthālīpākāṃśadvaye pūrvadevatāpanayena devatāntara vidhānādyuktam /
GV06apastgcu:3400: pañcamahāyajñebhyo na pṛthagvaiśvadevamityapi na;prakaraṇāntarāt saṃjñābhedācca karmabhedāvagateḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3401: naca karmabhede teṣāṃ prayogo durupapāda iti pramitabhedāpahnavo yuktaḥ,
GV06apastgcu:3402: yato bhāṣye vaiśvadevasya teṣāṃ ca prayogaḥ pṛthagevopapāditaḥ //
GV06apastgcu:3403: atha prayogabhāṣyamīṣadbhedaṃ sikhyate-vaiśvadevasya karmocyate'prasaṅgāt pañcamahāyajñānāṃ ca /
GV06apastgcu:3406_0: ityādi tatsvāmitvāviśeṣāt sapatnīkaścaritvā praśaste '- hanyārabhya 'āryāḥ prayatā
GV06apastgcu:3408: tato yadi prayāṇe gṛhevā vaiśvadevasya homasya sthāne 'gnirupasamādhātavyaḥ,
GV06apastgcu:3411: atha gṛhamedhino yadaśanīyamannaṃ tato homārtha haviṣyamannaṃ pātre kalpayati /
GV06apastgcu:3415: sarvata eva samavadāya manuṣyayajñārya pañcame yadi brāhmaṇatarpaṇaṃ nāvakalpate /
GV06apastgcu:3417: tataḥ pariṣecanaṃ kṛtvā prathamakalpitādannādyathāhutimātraṃ aṅguṣṭhaparvamātraṃ 'agnaye svāhe'tyādibhiḥ ṣaḍaihutīrhutvā uttaraṃ pariṣecanam /

GV06apastgcu:4333: iti vihitaṃ, yadeva nāndīśrāddhamabhyudayaśrāddhamiti prasiddhaṃ, tadevocyate /
GV06apastgcu:4340: śvobhūte ca brāhmaṇānāṃ bhojanaṃ, bhuktavadbhirevāśiṣāṃ vācanārtham /
GV06apastgcu:4342: atra ca kumārasya snavabhojanātprāk 'yajñopavītaṃ paramaṃ pavitram'ityādimantreṇa yajñopavītadhāraṇam /
GV06apastgcu:4343: 'bhojana ācamane svādhyāye ca yajñopavītī syāt'iti dharmaśāstravacanāt //
GV06apastgcu:4347: kecit-evamantaṃ mātāpitarau kurutaḥ, ata ūrdhvamācārya iti //
GV06apastgcu:4350: atra cānuvākagrahaṇaṃ gṛhyamantrāssamāmnātā eva na kalpasūtrasthā iti jñāpanārtham /
GV06apastgcu:4354: trīṃstrīn darbhānantardhāyottarābhiścatasṛbhiḥ pratimantraṃ pratidiśaṃ pravapati // ĀpGs_10.6 //
GV06apastgcu:4358: tena pūrva mantravadvapanaṃ karotyācāryaḥ paścānnāpita ityuktaṃ bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:4359: tatrāyaṃ prayogaḥ kumārasya śirasi prācyāṃ diśi trīn darbhānantardhāya 'yenāvapa'dityetayā pracchinatti kṣureṇa /
GV06apastgcu:4360: asāvityabya sthāne tasya nāma pthamayā vibhaktyā gṛhṇāti /
GV06apastgcu:4364: athāpa upaspṛśya tathaiva dakṣiṇyāṃ diśi 'yena pūṣe'ti /
GV06apastgcu:4367: atra saṃbudhyā nāmagrahaṇaṃ-tena te vapāmi yajñadattaśarmmannāyuṣeti //5//
GV06apastgcu:4370: tato 'yenāvapat'ityādibhiścatasṛbhiḥ pratimantraṃ pratidiśaṃ trīṃstrīn darbhānantardhāya keśān pravapati /
GV06apastgcu:4372: tatra prathame mantre asāvityasya sthāne viṣṇuśarmeti kumārasya nāmagrahaṇam /
GV06apastgcu:4374: vapantamuttarayānumantrayate dakṣiṇato mātā brahmacārī vā // ĀpGs_10.7 /
GV06apastgcu:4377: evamāryeṇa pratidiśaṃ pravapane kṛte nāpitastasya keśān vapati saṃsṛṣṭābhirevādbhirabartha kurvāṇaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:4381: dakṣiṇata upaviśya kumārasyamātā brahmacarī vā kaścit 'yat kṣureṇa'ityetayāvapantamācāryamanumantrayate /
GV06apastgcu:4386: ānaḍuhe śakṛtpiṇḍe yavānnidhāya tasmin keśānupayamyottarayodumbaramūle darbhastambe vā nidadhāti // ĀpGs_10.8 //
GV06apastgcu:4389_0: atha kumārasyamātā brahmacārī vā kaścit tasya dakṣiṇata upaviśya kasmiścit pātre
GV06apastgcu:4389_1: ānaḍuhaṃ śakṛtpiṇḍaṃ kṛtvā yavāśca tasmin piṇḍaṃ nidhāya tasmin keśānupayacchati
GV06apastgcu:4389_2: upagṛhṇāti yathā bhūmau na patanti tathā sarvānupayamya tatastān keśānudumbarasya
GV06apastgcu:4394: upanayanasya prakṛtatvānmātā brahmacārī vā 'uptvāya keśān'ityetayāānaḍuhe śakṛtpiṇḍeityādi yathopadeśaṃ karoti /
GV06apastgcu:4403: snātamagnerupasamādhānādyājyabhāgānte pālāśīṃ samidhamuttarayā'dhāpyottareṇāgniṃ dakṣiṇena padāśmanamāsthāpayatyātiṣṭheti // ĀpGs_10.9 //
GV06apastgcu:4416: tamācāryaḥ prayuṅkte mantraṃ ca vācayati, yamidhaṃ cādhāpayati /
GV06apastgcu:4419: ādhāpya samidhamuttareṇāgniṃ aśmānaṃpratiṣṭhitamanenāsthāpayati dakṣiṇena padā 'ātiṣṭhema'miti mantreṇa /
GV06apastgcu:4421: tenācāryo mantramuktatvā dhatriṇaṃ pādaṃ hastābhyāṃ gṛhītvāśmani nidhāpayati //8//
GV06apastgcu:4427: ājyabhāgānte kṛte snātaṃkumāraṃ 'āyurdā deva'ityetayāpālāśīṃva samidhaṃhaste gṛhītvā'dā- payati /
GV06apastgcu:4441: ekasminnevāhani tantukriyā vayanākriyā ca yasya tatsadyaḥkṛttotaṃ /
GV06apastgcu:4446: tataḥ taṃ parihitavantaṃ kumāraṃ ācāryaḥuttarayā ' parīdaṃ vāsa'ityetayāanumantrayate //9//
GV06apastgcu:4449: vāsaḥ yacchāṇyādi dharmaśāstre vihitaṃtat sadyaḥkṛttotaṃsadya eva chinnotaṃ,
GV06apastgcu:4451: kecit-ekasminne vāhani tantukriyā vayanakriyā ca yasya, tat sadyaḥkṛttotamiti /
GV06apastgcu:4452: evaṃbhūtaṃ 'revatīstvā'iti dvābhyāmabhimantrya 'yā akṛntan'ityetābhistisṛbhiḥ paridhāpya parihitaṃkumāraṃ 'parīdaṃ vāsaḥ'ityanayānumantrayate //10//
GV06apastgcu:4454: mauñjīṃ mekhalāṃ trivṛtāṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇamuttarābhyāṃ parivīyājinamuttaramuttarayā // ĀpGs_10.11 //
GV06apastgcu:4457: athamekhalāmuttarābhyāmṛgbhyāṃ 'iyaṃ duruktā'dityetābhyāṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ parivyayati kumāram /
GV06apastgcu:4472: mekhalāṃ ' iyaṃ duruktāt' ityetābhyāṃtriḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ parivyayati /
GV06apastgcu:4476: ityādi dharmaśāstre vihitamuttaraṃ vāsaḥ karoti 'mitrasya cakṣuḥ'ityetayā //11//
GV06apastgcu:4478_1: triḥ prokṣyottarairdakṣiṇe haste gṛhītvottarairdevatābhyaḥ parīdāyottareṇa yajuṣopanīya
GV06apastgcu:4483: avasthāpyasvayaṃ paścāt bhūmāvavasthāya svamañjalimudakena pūrayitvā tamjalimasmai kumārāya pratimukhaṃ darbheṣvavasthitāya prokṣaṇārthamānayati tasyāñjalau /
GV06apastgcu:4494: atha kumārasya hastaṃ gṛhṇāti uttaraurdaśabhirmantrauḥ 'agniṣṭe hastamagramī'dityādibhiḥ /
GV06apastgcu:4496: tatauttarai rekādaśabhiḥ 'agnaye tvā paridadāmī'tyādibhiḥ taṃ devatābhyaḥparidadāti /
GV06apastgcu:4498: paridāyatamuttareṇa yajuṣā'devasya tvā savituḥ'ityetenaupanayate vidyānuṣṭhānārtha ācāryaḥ svakulaṃ prāpayatītyarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:4501: kecit-asāvityantodātasya pāṭhāt ācāryasya nāma prathamayā nirdeśyaṃ manyante /
GV06apastgcu:4502: etatsambandhāt samastameva karmopanayanaṃ, yathā paśubandha iti /
GV06apastgcu:4503: upanīyasuprajā iti dakṣiṇe karṇe japati 'supoṣaḥ poṣai'rityevamanto japaḥ //11//
GV06apastgcu:4513: tataśca yadi sakṛtparidānaṃ syāt tadā vidhyaparādhāt sarvaprāyaścittaṃ hotavyam /
GV06apastgcu:4515: uttareṇa yajuṣā'devasya tvā savituḥ'ityanena upanayateātmanassamīpaṃ nayati /
GV06apastgcu:4528: savitrā prasūta ityevamanto mantraḥ āheti vacanaṃ uccaiḥ prayogārtham //1//
GV06apastgcu:4536: tatra yatra pṛṣṭaṃ tata ārabhya karmcārsyetyarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:4543: kasya brahmacāryasi śrīyajñaśarman ityācāryaḥ, prāṇasya brahmacāryasmi yajñaśarmeti kumāraḥ /
GV06apastgcu:4549: 'ko nāmāsī'tyādiṣu praśnaprativacanārtheṣu caturṣu mantreṣu praṣṭaṃ parasyācāryasya,
GV06apastgcu:4559: pṛṣṭaprativacanādūrdhva anuvākasyayaśśeṣaḥtaṃ 'eṣa te dva sūrye'tyādikaṃ para ācāryo japati //3//
GV06apastgcu:4584: dvitīyacaturthayorapi mantrayoḥ kumāra eva vaktā, devatābhidhānārtatvāt /
GV06apastgcu:4586: pradhānahomeṣu hāvayitveti vacanāt upahomeṣvācārya eva kartā //5//
GV06apastgcu:4591: ājyabhā gāntamuktvā ye paścāt pratyagāśiṣo mantrāḥ mekhalāparivyayaṇādiṣūktāḥ 'iyaṃ duruktāt'ityādyāstānapi svayamuktavā vācayati /
GV06apastgcu:4593: idaṃ tviha vaktavyam yāsu mekhalāparivyayaṇādiṣu kumārapradhānāsu saṃskārakriyāsu ye pratyagāśiṣo mantrāḥ,
GV06apastgcu:4594: taccodakairākhyātaiḥ karaṇatvena coditāḥ kriyāḥ tairmantraiḥ kṛtvā paścādvācayati /
GV06apastgcu:4597: yatra punarhomādiṣu guṇabhāva eva, na saṃskāryatvaṃ, tatra tān pratyagāśiṣo vācayatyeva /
GV06apastgcu:4599: atra asmin krame, na tu 'yathopadeśaṃ pradhānāhutīḥ'iti sāmānyavacanādājyabhāgānantarameva /
GV06apastgcu:4601: uttarāḥ'yoge yoge'; ityekādarśacaḥ pratyagāśiṣo vācayan haste gṛhītvā pratimantraṃhāvayati /
GV06apastgcu:4602: tatra dvitīyacaturthau 'imamagna āyuṣe''agniṣṭa āyuḥ pratarām'iti liṅgavirodhāt 'āyurdā deva jarasam'itivat svayameva brūyāt, nainaṃ vācayati /
GV06apastgcu:4605: tataśca agnirbhūtānāmadhiparissamāvatu'ityādīnāṃ pratyagāśiṣāmapi vācanaṃ na bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:4608: pariṣecanāntaṃ kṛtvāpareṇāgnimudagagraṃ kūrca nidhāya tasminnuttareṇa yajuṣopanetopaviśati // ĀpGs_11.7 //
GV06apastgcu:4613: kecit sāvitraṃ nāma vratamasmin kāla upākurvanti kecit trirātrānte sāvitrīmanubruvate /
GV06apastgcu:4615: nidhāyeti vacanādācārya eva nidhāne kartā, na māṇavakaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:4617: purastāt pratyaṅṅāsīna ityatra upanetuḥ purastāt yathā syāt agneḥ pirastāt mā bhūt iti /
GV06apastgcu:4618: tathā dakṣiṇena pāṇinā dakṣiṇaṃ pādamityatropanetuḥ pādo na māṇavakasya //6//
GV06apastgcu:4626: purastāt pratyaṅṅāsīnaḥ kumāro dakṣiṇena pāṇinā dakṣiṇaṃ pādamanvārabhyāha 'sāvitrīṃ bho anubrūhi'iti // ĀpGs_11.8 //
GV06apastgcu:4634: upanetuḥpurastāt prayaṅmukhaḥ āsīnaḥ kumāro dakṣiṇena pāṇināupaneturdakṣiṇaṃpādaṃ anvārabhyaupasaṃgṛhya 'sāvitrīṃ bho /
GV06apastgcu:4645: tena yadyasamarthaḥ kumāraḥ tāvat vaktuṃ tato yathāśakti vācayati /
GV06apastgcu:4646: svayaṃ vidhivat pūrvamuktvā prathamaṃ pacchaḥ pādepāde 'vasānam /
GV06apastgcu:4648: uttaramiti vaktavyaṃ tatsavituriti nirdeśaḥ sāvitrīpradeśoṣu sāvitryā samitsahasramādadhyā(āpa.dha.1-27-1)
GV06apastgcu:4649: dityādiṣu asyā eva grahaṇaṃ yathā syāt /
GV06apastgcu:4656_0: tatraca savitṛdevatyāmṛcamanubrūhītyaviśeṣeṇa prārthanā yāṃ kṛtāyāmapi yoyaṃ 'tatsaviturityanvāha'iti
GV06apastgcu:4666: atra ca sarvānuvacanasyādṛṣṭārthatvāt, grahītumasamarthasyāmi kumārasya sarvā nigadyate //10//
GV06apastgcu:4668: vyāhṛtīrvihṛtāḥ pādādiṣvanteṣu vā tathārrdhacayoruttamāṃ kṛtsnāyām // ĀpGs_11.11 //
GV06apastgcu:4671: tatrāvānuvacane viśeṣaḥ prathame vacane pādānāṃ trayāṇāṃ ādiṣvanteṣu vā tistro vyāhṛtayaḥ krameṇa vaktavyāḥ //9//
GV06apastgcu:4672: dvitīya vacane arrdhacayorāditaḥ antato vā dve vyāhṛtī krameṇa vaktavye /
GV06apastgcu:4682: oṃsivaḥ tatsaviturveṇyaṃ bhargo devasya dhāmahi dhiyo yo naḥ pracodayāt //
GV06apastgcu:4698: oṃsuvaḥ tatsaviturvareṇyaṃ bhargodevasya dhīmahi dhiyo yo naḥ pracodayāt '; /
GV06apastgcu:4699: anteṣu veti pakṣe prayogaḥ-'oṃ tatsaviturvareṇyaṃ bhūḥ /
GV06apastgcu:4701: oṃ dhiyo yo naḥ pracodayāt suvaḥ //
GV06apastgcu:4702: oṃ tatsaviturvareṇyaṃ bhargo devasya dhīmahi bhūḥ /
GV06apastgcu:4704: oṃtatsaviturvareṇyaṃ bhargo devasya dhīmahi dhiyo yo naḥ pracodayāt suvaḥ 'iti //11//
GV06apastgcu:4712: mantre asāvityanena prāṇo 'bhidhīyate nācāryo nāpi māṇavakaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:4718: asāvi- tyatra ca nāsti nāmagrahaṇam, prāṇābhidhānatvāt /
GV06apastgcu:4741: pālāśo daṇḍo brāhmaṇasya naiyyagrodhasskandhajo 'vāṅgro rājanyasya bādara audumbaro vā vaiśyasya // ĀpGs_11.15 //
GV06apastgcu:4744: rājanyavaiśyayoḥ viśeṣavidhānādeva siddhe brāhmaṇagrahaṇaṃ ayamapi vidhirrvaṇasaṃyuktau yathā syāditi /
GV06apastgcu:4746: itarathā rājanyavaiśyayoreva syāt tayoreva varṇasaṃyuktaṃ vidhānamiti kṛtvā //14//
GV06apastgcu:4751: badaryā vikāro bādaraḥvṛkṣaprakaramāt udumbaro vṛkṣaḥ, na tāmram //16//
GV06apastgcu:4763: pūrvo vidhirrvaṇasaṃyuktaḥ, ayaṃ tu sarvasādhāraṇo na kenacit
GV06apastgcu:4765: atra ca sāmayācārika eva daṇḍavidhissarvacaraṇārthaḥ sannihānūdyate naiyyagrodhādiṣu mantraprāpaṇārtham /
GV06apastgcu:4768: “devā vai brahmannavadanta tat parṇa upāśṛṇot suśravā vai nāmeti“(tai.saṃ.35-7)
GV06apastgcu:4769: vārkṣo daṇḍa itvetāvataiva siddhe avarṇasaṃyogeneti vacane kalpāntarayorasaṃbhedadarśanārtham-yadi varṇasaṃyuktaḥ kalpaḥ prakrāntaḥ sa evāsamāvartanāt kartavya iti //17//
GV06apastgcu:4772: vārkṣaḥvṛkṣasya mājñiyasya vikāraḥ, na tu veṇuvetrādeḥ /
GV06apastgcu:4774: atra yadyapi 'tat parṇa upāśrṛṇotsuśravā vai nāma'(tai.saṃ.3-5-7)
GV06apastgcu:4779: kecit -tatraiva sarvacaraṇārtha vihitānāṃ daṇḍānāṃ gṛhye 'nuvādaḥ sarveṣāmupādāne 'pi śrutyaitanmantravidhānārtha iti //16//
GV06apastgcu:4781: smṛtaṃ ca ma ityetadvācayitvā gurave varaṃ datvodāyuṣetyutthāpyottarairādityamupatiṣṭhate // ĀpGs_11.17 //
GV06apastgcu:4784: atha daṇḍamādāya tatraivāsīnaḥ kumāraḥsmṛtañca ma ityetatvratasaṃkīrtanamāha /
GV06apastgcu:4789: vivakṣite tu tasmin varadāne upasthāne cā'cārya eva kartā syāt /
GV06apastgcu:4795: teṣāṃ pratyagāśiṣṭvādeva vācane prāpte vācayitveti punarvacanaṃ vācanavaradānayoḥ nairantaryārtham /
GV06apastgcu:4796: athagurave ācāryāya kumāro varaṃ gāṃ 'guro!varaṃ te dadāmi'iti dadāti /
GV06apastgcu:4799: ityādita ārabhya 'devi dakṣiṇe'ityevamantamuktvā 'rudrāya gāṃ tenāmṛtatvamaśyām'ityādi sandhāya 'uttānastvāṅgīrasaḥ pratigṛhṇātu'(tai.ā.3-10)
GV06apastgcu:4804: atra vācayitvetyādeḥ ktvāpratyayasya, kriyāvidhānamātre tātparya, na tu samānakartṛkatve 'pi /
GV06apastgcu:4805: jñāpitaṃ cait 'yoktraṃ vimucya tāṃ tataḥ pra vā vāhayet'(āpa.gṛ.5-13)
GV06apastgcu:4810: vācayitvotthāpyeti tu ṇijartho he turavivakṣitaḥ'anyathā tvasamānakartṛkatvāt varadānamupasthānaṃ cācāryakartṛkaṃ syāt tathā gurugrahaṇaṃ caulādau brahmaṇe varadānārthamiti //17//
GV06apastgcu:4813: yaṃ kāmayeta nāyama (yaṃ ma) cchidyeteti tamuttarayā dakṣiṇe haste gṛhṇīyāt // ĀpGs_11.18 //
GV06apastgcu:4817: ayaṃ matto na chidyeta na viyujyeta madadhīna eva sāyādāsamāvarthanāditi tametasmin kāle dakṣiṇe haste gṛhṇīyātuttarayarcā'yasmin bhūtami'tyetayā /
GV06apastgcu:4823: yaṃ kumāraṃ ayamāsamāvartanānmatto na cchidyena na viyucyetetikāmayeta,
GV06apastgcu:4824: tamuttarayā 'yasmim bhūtam'ityanayarcā sambudhdyā ca nāma gṛhītvādakṣiṇe haste gṛhṇīyātyadyamācāryaścaturvedī sarvaśāstravit adhyāpayituṃ vyākhyātuṃ ca śaknoti //18//
GV06apastgcu:4828: etamupanayanāgniṃ vyahaṃ dhārayanti avināśinaṃ kurvanti pitrādayaḥ //20//
GV06apastgcu:4848: pari tve ti parimṛjya tasminnuttarairmantraissamidha ādadhyāt // ĀpGs_11.21 //
GV06apastgcu:4851_0: tamupanayanāgniṃ 'pari tve 'tyanena mantreṇaparimṛjya sarvato mārjamudakena kṛtvāuttarairmantraiḥ
GV06apastgcu:4851_1: 'agnaye samidha'mityādibhiḥ dvādaśabhiḥ pratimantraṃ samidho nityamādadhyāt brahmacārī /
GV06apastgcu:4858: adhikārādeva siddhe tasminniti vacanaṃ tryahādūrdvamapi tasminupanayanāgnāveva samidādhānaṃ yathā syāditi /
GV06apastgcu:4874: tathā dharmaśāstre tu 'samiddhamagniṃ pāṇinā parisamūhenna samūhanyā'; (āpa.dha.1-4-18)
GV06apastgcu:4882: evaṃ tryahaṃ dhāraṇapakṣe tryahādūrdhvaanyasminnapyagnāvidaṃ karma kartavyamityarthaḥ //23//
GV06apastgcu:4891: evamuktena vidhinā sadā upanayanaprabhṛtyāsamāvartanāt aharahassāyaṃ prātaḥ,
GV06apastgcu:4894: na tūpanayanāgnirnaṣṭa iti nityasya samidādhānasya lopaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:4907: athaṃ taṃuttarayarcā'brahmacāryasī'tyetayāsaṃśāstiguruḥ saṃśkṣayatītyarthaḥ yathāpāṭhāmṛcā saṃśāsanaṃ arta ca kathayati /
GV06apastgcu:4913: pūrvavat prativacanaṃ sarvatrā karma kuru guruśuśrūṣaṇādi /
GV06apastgcu:4916: apara āha-atha yaḥ pūrvotthāyī jaghanyasaṃveśī tamāhurna svapitīti /
GV06apastgcu:4919: ācāryādhīno bhavamātāpitrorapi vaśaṃ tyaktvā ācāryavaśe vartasvetyarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:4921: atra bodhāyanaḥ-“athāsmā ariktaṃ pātraṃ prayacchātrāha mātaramevāgre bhikṣasveti” /
GV06apastgcu:4929: apo 'śānamayānujñāto 'pa eva piba, vabhukṣāṃ tu dhāraya /
GV06apastgcu:4937: atra cāsītichāndaso lakāraḥ, suṣupthā iti rūpa ca /
GV06apastgcu:4938: saṃśāsaneṣu ca sarveṣu kumāro bāḍham' 'evaṃ karomi'iti prativacanaṃ dāpyaḥ /

GV06apastgcu:5613: uttarayābhimantrya dakṣiṇaṃ pādaṃ brāhmaṇāya prayacchetsavyaṃ śūdrāya // ĀpGs_13.5 //
GV06apastgcu:5616: atha pūjyamānastā apaḥ uttarayarcā“āpaḥ pādāvanejanī“ritye tayābhimantrya prakṣālayitre 'brāhmaṇāya dakṣṇaṃ pādaṃ pūrva prayacchet prasārayet /
GV06apastgcu:5622: patnīyajamānau jaṅghe dhāvata iti yajñe viśeṣaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:5623: āpaḥ pādyā iti prakaraṇādeva siddhe pādagrahaṇamuttaratra pādapratyayo mābhūdityevamartham /

GV06apastgcu:5888: ācāryāyartvije śvaśurāya rājña iti parisaṃvatsarādupatiṣṭhadbhyo gaurmadhupa4kaśca /
GV06apastgcu:5891: iti snātakāyācāryāyartvije upādhyāyāya śvaśurāya rājñe ca dakṣiṇārthagavā saha madhuparko vihitaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:5893: utyate- iha vikalpena vihitasya trivṛtaḥ pāṅktasya ca tasmin gomadhuparke avedādhyāyāya śvaśurāya ca dīyamāne ca prāptyartham /
GV06apastgcu:5895: tadācāryartvidādhyāyaśvaśurarājabhya eva parisaṃvatsarādupatiṣṭhadbhyaḥ punaḥ punaḥ kāryam,
GV06apastgcu:5900: sakṛt na prativatasaraṃ kalau gorālambhsya nṣedhādraurityuttkā yajño vardhatāmityādi japet madhyamantralopaḥ)
GV06apastgcu:5901: pravaktre vedasya vedārthasya ca citrāya prasiddhāya bhinnasaṃśayāyetyarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:5905: pravaktā yaḥ padavākyapramāṇābhyāṃ prakarṣeṇa vakti sādhuśabdānāmuccārayitā,
GV06apastgcu:5907: citraḥ prakāśaḥ loke prasiddha ityarthaḥ . idaṃ pravaktureva viśeṣaṇam /
GV06apastgcu:5911: yassaṣaḍaṅgaṃ vedamadhīte, arthāśca jānāti sa vedādhyāyaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:5912: nanu-sāmayācārike gomadhuparke dharmā nopadiṣṭāḥ, sa kathaṃ kartavyaḥ?
GV06apastgcu:5914: tena gṛhye yājñikaprasiddhyā madhuparkasaṃśike karmaṇi upadiṣṭā eva dharmāḥ 'gomadhiparkarahaḥ'ityatra madhuparkanāmnā atidiśyante,
GV06apastgcu:5920: 'dadhimadhusaṃsṛṣṭaṃ madhuparkaḥ'iti pratyakṣavidhānādatideśaprāptaṃ trivṛttvaṃ pāṅktatvaṃ ca bādhyata(āpa.śrau.2-8-8) iti /
GV06apastgcu:5921: ayamatra niścitor'thaḥ ācāryāyartvije vedādhyāyāya śvaśurāya rājñe ca dakṣiṇārthādhikagavā vinā gārhyaḥ sāmayācāriko vā madhiparkaḥ kāryaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:5925: avedādhyāyābhyāṃ tu varāpacitābhyāṃ snātakāya ca snānadina evāgatāya gavā vinā gṛhyokto dharmokto vā /
GV06apastgcu:5926: prakāśāya ca pravaktre vinā gavā gārhyaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:5931: anyathā saṃvatsaramapi proṣitābhyāṃ sakṛdapi na sidhyet /
GV06apastgcu:5932: ṛtvije ca karmaṇi karmaṇi pūjā kāryā /
GV06apastgcu:5940: sāmayācārikeṣu sarvācaraṇārthena vihitāyāṃ pūjāyāṃ, gārhyasyāsmadīyānāṃ dharmātideśārthatvāt /
GV06apastgcu:5944: tathā vedasya vedārthasya ca pravaktre ctrāya etatsakṛtkāryamiti /
GV06apastgcu:5955: sīmantonnayanaṃ prathame garbhe caturthe māsi // ĀpGs_14.1 //
GV06apastgcu:5959: sa unnīyate yasmin karmaṇi tatsāmantonnayanannāyakarma garbhasaṃskāraḥ /
GV06apastgcu:5962: ādhāre ca saṃskṛte tatrāhitāḥ sarva eva garbhāḥ saṃskṛtā bhavanti //1//
GV06apastgcu:5966: yasmin karmaṇi garbhiṇyāssīmanta unnīyate tat vyākhyāsyāma iti śeṣa- /
GV06apastgcu:5973: brāhmaṇānbhojayitvā'śiṣo vācayitvāgnerupasamādhānādyājyabhāgānte 'nvārabdhāyāmuttarā āhutīrhutvā jayādi pratipadyate // ĀpGs_14.2 //
GV06apastgcu:5977: atha tasminnahanibrāhmaṇān bhojayitvātairbhuktavadbhiḥāśiṣo vācayitvāagnerupasamādhānādi pratipadyate sakṛtpātrāṇi śalalyādayaśca saha śamyaḥ //2//
GV06apastgcu:5978: aṣṭau pradhānāhutayo 'dhātā dadātu no rayi'miti catasro 'yastvāhṛdā kīriṇe'ti catasraḥ //3//
GV06apastgcu:5984: uttarāḥ 'dhātā dadātu no rayim'iti catasro 'yastvā hṛdā kīriṇā'iti catasra ityaṣṭau /
GV06apastgcu:5987: pariṣecanāntaṃ kṛtvāpareṇāgniṃ prācīmupaveśya treṇyā śalalyā tribhirdarbhapuñjīlaiśśalāluglapsenetyūrdhva sīmantamunnayati vyāhṛtībhiruttarābhyāṃ ca // ĀpGs_14.3 //
GV06apastgcu:5999: etāni dravyāṇi yugapadgṛhītvātaissīmantamunnayati ūrdhvamudūhati bhūrbhuvassuvaritye- tābhiḥ
GV06apastgcu:6002: iha mantrasamāmnāye vyāhṛtīnāṃ pāṭho na kartavyaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:6006: kiñcāsati pāṭhe vyāhṛtibhiruttarābhyāñcetyucyamāne yājamānasamāmnāyāt grahaṇaṃ prāpnoti-vyāhṛtibhiruttarābhyāñca mantrābhyāṃ 'ucchuṣmo agna'; ityetābhyāmiti /
GV06apastgcu:6009: tasmādasmādeva samāmnāyadgrahaṇaṃ yathā syāditi vyāhṛtīnāmiha pāṭhaḥ //4//
GV06apastgcu:6042: sāsālvānāṃsīmantakarmaṇi gāthā sālvadeśanivāsināṃ asyāmṛci gānaṃ kartavyamityarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:6055: kṣatriyavaiśyānāṃ tu 'somomaeva no rājāvatu mānuṣīḥ prajāḥ (āśva.gṛ.1-12-7)
GV06apastgcu:6056: ityāśvalāyanīye dṛṣṭāyāṃ sārvavarṇīkyā- mṛci gānaṃ kartavyam /
GV06apastgcu:6064: dvitīye mantre asau śabdasya sthāne nadyā nāma saṃbudhyā nirdeṣṭavyam /
GV06apastgcu:6067: kṣatriyāṇāṃ tu sarveṣāṃ kalpāntaradṛṣṭāyāṃ sārvavarṇikyāmṛci gānaṃ bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:6073: 'soma eva no rājā'ityasvāṃ asāvityasya sthāne 'kāveri''vegavati'iti sambudhyānadīnirdesaścabhavati /
GV06apastgcu:6074: kasyā nadyāḥ?iti cet 'yasyāṃ vasanti' samīpasaptamī ceyam /
GV06apastgcu:6083: yavāśca prāgeva vaptavyāḥ yathāsmin kāle virūḍhā bhavanti //9//
GV06apastgcu:6089: uduteṣu nakṣatreṣu prācīmudīcīṃ vā diśamupaniṣkramya vatsamanvārabhya vyāhṛtīśca japitvā vācaṃ visṛjet // ĀpGs_14.8 //
GV06apastgcu:6111: yadāpi caturthe tadā sīmantāt pūrvameva puṃsavanam /
GV06apastgcu:6118: puṃsuvanamityapikarmanāmadheyam, yena karmaṇā nimittena garbhiṇi pumāṃsameva sūte tatpuṃsavanam /
GV06apastgcu:6124: bahucādiṣu smṛtyantareṣūbhayathā darśanāt . yadi puṃsavanaṃ caturthe syāttadā pūrva sīmantaṃ kṛtvaiva /
GV06apastgcu:6129: idamapi sīmantavatprathamagarbha eva, na tu pratigarbham;piṣṭapeṣaṇanyā- yadeva /
GV06apastgcu:6131: tiṣyeṇa tiṣyanakṣatre puṃsavanaṃ kartavyayamiti vyavāhitena sambandhaḥ;
GV06apastgcu:6135: nyagrodhasya yā prācyudīcīṃ vā śākhā tatassavṛṣaṇāṃ śuṅgāmāhṛtya sīmantavadagnerupasamādhānādi // ĀpGs_14.10 //
GV06apastgcu:6138: nyagrodhasyavṛkṣasyayā prācī śākhodīcī vā tasyāḥśuṅgāmagrāṅkuraṃ savṛṣaṇāṃphalaṃ vṛṣaṇamiti vyapadiśyate sādṛśyādeva /
GV06apastgcu:6139: tadvatīṃ śuṅgāmāhṛtya sīmantavadagnerupasamādhānādi pariṣecanāntaṃ karma pratipadyate /
GV06apastgcu:6140: agnerupasamādhānādivacanāt tataḥ pūrva brāhmaṇabhojanamāśīrvacanaṃ ca na bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:6142: tathā yat pariṣecanādīrdhva saṃśāsanādi tadapi na bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:6146: śuṅgayā saha paridhaya eva, na śamyāḥ /
GV06apastgcu:6147: ājyabhāgānte 'nvārabdhāyāṃ dhātā dadātu no rayi'miti catasro yastvā hṛdā kīriṇeti catasraḥ jayādi pratipadyate /
GV06apastgcu:6153: atra ca sīmantavadagnerupasamādhānādītyatideśāt brāhmaṇabhojanamāśīrvacanaṃ ca tantrāt purastānnivartate /
GV06apastgcu:6158: 'loke ca bhūtikarmasvetadādīnyeva vākyāni syuryathāpuṇyāhaṃ svastiṛdvimiti vācayitvā (āpa.dha.1-13-9) iti vacanācca /
GV06apastgcu:6159: pātraprayege ca śuṅgādīnāṃ karmopayuktānāṃ sakṛdeva sādanam /
GV06apastgcu:6160: tathātra paridhaya eva, na tu śamyāḥ 'śamyāḥ paridhyarthe'iti atra caulagodānagrahaṇāt /
GV06apastgcu:6161: tathaiva 'sīmantavadagnerupasamādhānādi'ityādinā pariṣecanāntakalpātideśasya vivakṣitatvādihāpi ta evāṣṭau pradhānahomāḥ //10//
GV06apastgcu:6163: 3 tānaṅkurānanṛtumatyā kumāryā peṣayitvottānaṃ śāyitāyā garbhiṇyā dakṣiṇanāsāyāṃ niṣecanam /
GV06apastgcu:6164: anavasnātayā kumāryā dṛṣatputre dṛṣatputreṇa peṣayitvā pariplāvyāperaṇāgniṃ prācīmuttānāṃ nipātyottareṇa yajuṣāṅguṣṭhena dakṣiṇe nāsikācchidre 'pinayati // ĀpGs_14.11 //
GV06apastgcu:6173: tatra śuṅgāṃ peṣayitvā vastreṇa pariplāvya apareṇāgniṃ prācīṃ prāṅmukhīṃuttānāṃ ūrdhvamukhīṃ,
GV06apastgcu:6174: nipātya śāyayitvāuttareṇa yajuṣā'puṃsuvanamasī'tyanena taṃ rasaṃ aṅguṣṭhena tasyā nāsikācchidre dakṣiṇe apinayatiapigamayati /
GV06apastgcu:6179_0: snānanimittasya rajaso 'nutpannatvāt yā na snātā tayāanavasnātayākanyayā dṛṣadarthāpanne
GV06apastgcu:6180: 'puṃsuvanamasi'iti yajuṣā dakṣiṇa nāsikāchidre aṅguṣṭhenakaraṇabhūtena tadrasamapinayati garbha prāpayati /
GV06apastgcu:6196: vacanāt putrasya sakṛdutpādanaṃ nityamiti yāvadekaḥ putra utpadyeta tāvadūgarbheṣu bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:6197: ūrdhva tu putrecchāyāṃ satyāṃ bhavati duhiturīpsāyāṃ na bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:6199: puṃsuvanasya tu paścādupadeśo yathā caturthe māsi tatkriyate tasya paścāt prayogārtha iti //14//
GV06apastgcu:6206: phalamakṣe 'pi 'eṣa vā anṛṇo yaḥ putrī'ityādiva canaissakṛdapi putrotpādanasya avaśyaka- rtavyatvāt tadaṅgaṃ puṃsuvanaṃ prathame garbhe kartavyameva /
GV06apastgcu:6207: tata ūrdhva tu yatra yatra garbhe putrepsā tatra tatra kartavyaṃ nānyatra /
GV06apastgcu:6208: yastvatikrānta- codanaḥ strīreva janayeyamiti kāmayate tasya sakṛdapi na bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:6209: anye tu-pumāṃsaṃ janayatītyetadvacanaṃ garbhe garbhe 'sya kartavyatāparamiti //12//
GV06apastgcu:6214: yena karmaṇā kṣipraṃ sūyate tatkṣipraṃsuvanaṃnāma karmocyate //15//
GV06apastgcu:6217: yenakṣipraṃśīghraṃ sūte 'ntarvatnī na ciraṃ kālaṃ pīḍyate tatkṣipraṃsuvanaṃnāma iti karmopadiśyate //13//
GV06apastgcu:6218: anāprītena śarāveṇānusrotasamudakamāhṛtya pattastūryantīṃ nidhāya mūrdhañchoṣyantīmuttareṇa yajuṣābhimṛśyaitābhiradbhiruttarābhiravokṣet // ĀpGs_14.14 //
GV06apastgcu:6222: pattaḥpādayoradhastāt yasyāḥ śvetopamāni patrāṇi pītopa- māni puṣpāṇi yā ca madhyāṅṇe puṣyati sā tīryantī vaneṣu jāyate /
GV06apastgcu:6223: veṇupatropamāni ca yasyāḥ patrīṇi raktopamāni ca puṣpāṇi yāṃ cāgniśikhetyāhuḥ /
GV06apastgcu:6224: sā śoṣyantī tat oṣadhidvayaṃ samūlapatramādāya suṣliṣṭaṃ nidadhāti /
GV06apastgcu:6228: daśabhiriti liṅgādubhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāmabhimarśanam anulomaṃ mukhādārabhya tata etābhirāhṛtābhirevādbhistāmavokṣet /
GV06apastgcu:6229: uttarābhistisṛbhiḥ ṛgbhiḥ'yathaiva somaḥ pavata'ityetābhiḥ pratimantra mavokṣaṇam //16//
GV06apastgcu:6236: śoṣyantīṃprasavapīḍayā śuṣyamāṇāṃ striyaṃ 'ābhiṣṭvāhaṃ daśabhirabhibhūmṛśāmi'iti yajuṣobhābhyāṃ hastābhyām /
GV06apastgcu:6244: tāṃ mūrdhniṃ nidhāya striyaṃ yatra kvacābhimṛśediti /
GV06apastgcu:6263: jarāyu garbhāveṣṭhanaṃ,tadyadi na patet, tata uttaro vidhiḥ kartavyaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:6265: kṣipraṃsuvane yo vidhiścoditaḥ 'anāprītena śarāveṇe'tyādi (evaṃ vihitābhiradbhiḥ uttarābhyāṃmantrābhyāṃ“tisadeva padyasva,
GV06apastgcu:6267: ete ca karmaṇī svabhāryāviṣayau)yakṣmagṛhītāmanyāṃ veti karmāntare yatnakaraṇāt /
GV06apastgcu:6271: yadi prasūtāyāstasyājarāyugarbhaprāvaraṇaṃna patettadā'anāprītena śarāveṇa'ityādividhinā'hṛtābhiradbhiḥ aitu garbhau akṣitaḥ'
GV06apastgcu:6275: iha tu 'tiladeva padyadeva padyasva'ityekā ṛk;'niraitu pṛśni'ityaparaṃ yajuriti //15//
GV06apastgcu:6276: iti śrīsudarśanācāryaviracite gṛhyatātparyadarśane caturdaśaḥ khaṇḍaḥ samāptaḥ //
GV06apastgcu:6280: jātaṃ vātsapreṇābhimṛśyottareṇa yajuṣopastha ādhāyottarābhyamābhimantraṇaṃ mūrdhanyavaghrāṇaṃ dakṣiṇe karṇe jāpaḥ // ĀpGs_15.1 //
GV06apastgcu:6283: jātamiti pulliṅgasya vivakṣitatvāt puṃsa evāyaṃ jātakarmākhyaḥ saṃskāraḥ /
GV06apastgcu:6290: uttaratra māturiti viśeṣaṇādiha sva upastha ādadhāti /
GV06apastgcu:6291: uttarābhiriti pāṭhaḥ uttarābhiḥ tisṛbhiḥ ṛgbhiḥ abhimantraṇādīni trīṇi kartavyāni /
GV06apastgcu:6296: kecittu uttarābhyāmiti dvivacanāntapāṭhamāśritya dvayormantrayoḥ triṣvapi karmasu viniyogaṃ manyante /
GV06apastgcu:6298: āśvalāyanaścāha-karṇayorupanidhāya medhājananaṃ japati medhāṃ te devassaviteti (āśva.śrau.1-13-2) //1//
GV06apastgcu:6301: jātaṃ jātamātram, prāṅnābhivardhanāt puṃso jātakarma vidhīyate //
GV06apastgcu:6305: ityanuvākena ante sakṛdabhimṛśya 'asminnaham'ityanena yajuṣā svasyopasthe tamādhāya,
GV06apastgcu:6308: etayorevarcoḥ dakṣiṇe karṇe jāpo japa ityarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:6316: ata evāśvalāyanaḥ -“karṇayorupanidhāya me dhājananaṃ japati'medhāṃ te devassavitā'iti” /
GV06apastgcu:6317: madhughṛtaprāśanaṃ tu 'tvayi medhām'; iti yajurbhireva tribhiriti /
GV06apastgcu:6330: asyārthaḥ-rohiṇī revatī maghā mṛgaśīrṣā jyeṣṭhā titrā-ityeteṣu ādyakṣaranirdiṣṭeṣu ādau vṛddhirbavati,
GV06apastgcu:6333: rūpaṃ ca rauhiṇaḥ raivataḥ māghaḥ mārgaśīrṣaḥ jyaiṣṭhaḥ caitraḥ iti /
GV06apastgcu:6334: ṣṭhātpe ca, proṣṭhapadetyatra ṣṭhakārātpare pakāre ca vṛddhiḥ /
GV06apastgcu:6339: śravaḥ śravaṇaṃ śa-śatabhiṣak aśvayuk ityeteṣu caturṣu vā vikalpena vṛddhiḥ /
GV06apastgcu:6340: atra ca śravaṇāpabharaṇyoḥ bahulagrahaṇādeva luko vikalpaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:6347: śeṣeṣu na uktādanyeṣu nakṣatreṣu na vṛddhiḥ yato 'tra 'śraviṣṭhāphalgunyanūrādhāsvātitiṣyapunarvasuhasta viśākhāṣāḍhābahulālluk'; (pā.sū.4-3-34)
GV06apastgcu:6348: ityanena, nakṣatrebhyo bahulam'ityanena ca lugva bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:6350: iti strīpratyayanivṛttiḥ kṛttikaḥ tiṣyaḥ āśreṣaḥ phālgunaḥ hastaḥ viśākhaḥ anūrādhaḥ āṣāḍhaḥ śraviṣṭhaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:6351: āmvoḥ kaparaḥ svaro 'ntyaḥ, ārdramūlayorantyaḥ svaraḥ kaśabdaparo bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:6359: evaṃ sarveṣāṃ nakṣatranāmnāṃ prathamayā nirdeśaḥ sūktavāke /
GV06apastgcu:6365: yathā pare na jānanti tathā vaktavyamityarthaḥ sūktavākādiṣvapyevameva //3//
GV06apastgcu:6368: nakṣatranāma ca rahasyaṃ nirdiśatīti sūtre praṇetavye sūtrāntarakaraṇāt yat nāmanakṣatranibandhanaṃ,
GV06apastgcu:6369: yacca daśamyāṃ kṛtaṃ tadubhayaṃ jātakarma sūktavākānnaprāśanābhivādanādiṣu nityaṃ rahasyameva nirdeśyaṃ bhavati //3//
GV06apastgcu:6372_0: ghṛtamiti saṃsṛjya tasmin darbheṇa hiraṇyaṃ niṣṭarkya badhvāvadāyottarairmantraiḥ
GV06apastgcu:6372_1: kumāraṃ prāśayitvottarābhiḥ pañcabhissnāpayitvā dadhi ghṛtamiti saṃsṛjya kāṃsyena
GV06apastgcu:6372_2: pṛṣadājyaṃ vyāhṛtībhiroṅgāracaturthābhiḥ kumāraṃ prāśayitvādbhiśśeṣaṃ saṃsṛjya goṣṭhe
GV06apastgcu:6375: madhughṛtamityetadvayaṃ viṣamaparimāṇaṃ kāsyapātre saṃsṛjya tasmin hiraṇyaṃ darbheṇa,
GV06apastgcu:6378: tathā baddhena hiraṇyena tadrasadvayamādāya tenaiva kumāraṃ prāśayet /
GV06apastgcu:6381: tato 'nyasmin kāṃsyapātre dadhi ghṛtañca saṃsṛḍya tatpṛṣadāḍyaṃ tenaiva kāṃsyena prāśayati /
GV06apastgcu:6384: kumāragrahaṇaṃ asamarthasyāpi kumārasyaiva prāśanamupāyena yathā syāditi /
GV06apastgcu:6385: tena yatnābhāve“dhānāḥ kumārān prāśayanti““kṣaitrapattyaṃ ca prāśayanti“ityādau prāśanamasamarthānāṃ na bhavati //4//
GV06apastgcu:6388: niṣṭakarya śikhābandhanavat sarandhreṇa granthinā niṣṭarkya badhnāti;
