GV06apastgcu:7548: yathedaṃ śrāvaṇyāṃ karma kataṃ evaṃ mārgaśīrṣyāmapīti /
GV06apastgcu:7549: tena 'pārvaṇavadājyabhāgānta'ityādeḥ dhānāḥ kumārān prāśayantī'tyantasya kṛtsnasya kalpasyātra pravṛttiḥ /
GV06apastgcu:7551: śrāvaṇyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ iti prakṛte punaḥ paurṇamāsyāmityucyate jñāpanārtham
GV06apastgcu:7553: tena pūrvasūtre āmārgaśīrṣyā iti karmāvadhitvena na gṛhyate /
GV06apastgcu:7555: tena mārgaśīrṣyā paurṇamāsyāmahani yadaśanīyasya baliharaṇaṃ bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:7556: kālavācitve tu na prāpnoti yadi ca maryādāyāmākāraḥ /
GV06apastgcu:7558: iṣyate cāstamite sthālīpākakarmaṇi saptarbhirdravyairba- liharaṇamahani ca yadaśanīyasya /
GV06apastgcu:7559: tasmāt pūrvatra karmaṇyapadeśo yathā syāt, kālasya vyapadeśo mā bhūditi paurṇamāsyāmiti viśeṣaṇam /
GV06apastgcu:7560: evañca yadaśanīyavacanenobhayoḥ kālayorbaliharaṇamiti yaduktaṃ tadeva sthitaṃ bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:7567: patnyavahantītyādi dhānāprāśanāntaṃ kṛtsnaṃ karmānuṣṭheyamityarthaḥ . sthālīpākahome tu'mārgaśīrṣyaipaurṇamāsyai svāhe'ti viśeṣaḥ //3//
GV06apastgcu:7572: yadyapyayaṃ sannāmastasminneva mantre paṭhitaḥ tathāpyasatyasmin vacane baliharaṇamantre caturthapādasya pṛthagviniyogābhāvāt catuṣpādā sā vijñāyeta /
GV06apastgcu:7574: tripadaiva sā tasyā eva tṛtīyasya pādasya sannāmo 'yamuttamaḥ paṭhitaḥ tasyaiva viniyogakālo na prāgiti /
GV06apastgcu:7575: kiñca kṛtsnamevaitat karma dhānāprāśanāntaṃ sthālīpākaśabdena gṛhyate etacca darśitaṃ bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:7586: evamityanena vacanena śrāvaṇīvidhānasya kṛtsnasyātidiṣṭatvādasyāpi sthālīpākasya śeṣatvena baliharaṇaprāptiḥ /
GV06apastgcu:7594: na cāyamātyantika utsargaḥ,nityatvena sarpabalessaṃvatsare samvatsare kartavyatvāt //5//
GV06apastgcu:7602: tat karma vakṣyate-tatra anāhitāgnigrahaṇamāhitāgneraupāsanavataḥ śrautenāgrayaṇena saha samuccayapratiṣedhārtham /
GV06apastgcu:7609: varṣāsu śyāmākairyajeta, śaradi vrīhibhiḥ, vasante yavaiḥ, yathurtuveṇuyavairiti ca //6//
GV06apastgcu:7617: iti vacanāt, pitṛyajñe tu nirrvatya vipraścandakṣaye 'gnimān /
GV06apastgcu:7620: sarvādhīnino 'pi māsiśrāddhaṃ homavarja kartavyameva upadśamataṃ tu-saśeṣādhāninaścāhitāgne /
GV06apastgcu:7623: āgrayaṇamiti karmanāmadheyam, yena karmaṇā agre navadravyaṃ devān prāpayatīti /
GV06apastgcu:7627_0: navānāṃ sthālīpākaṃ śrapayitvā'grayaṇadevatābhyaḥ sviṣṭakṛccaturthābhyo hutvā taṇḍulānāṃ
GV06apastgcu:7627_1: mukhaṃ pūrayitvā gīrtvā'camyaudanapiṇḍaṃ saṃvṛttyottareṇa yajuṣāgārastūpa udviddhet // ĀpGs_19.7 //
GV06apastgcu:7631_0: navānāṃ vrīhīṇāṃ yavānāṃ vā aupāsane śrapayitvā pratiṣṭhitamabhighāryāgnimupasamādhāya
GV06apastgcu:7631_1: saṃparistīya tūṣṇīṃ samantaṃ pariṣicya durvī saṃmṛcya sthālīpākādupaghātaṃ catasra
GV06apastgcu:7633: tato vśvebhyo devebhyaḥ, tato dyāvāpṛthivībhyāṃ, agnaye sviṣṭakṛta iti /
GV06apastgcu:7642: tān gīrtvā bhakṣayitvā'camya tata odanapiṇḍaṃ saṃvartayāti prayatnena sampādayati /
GV06apastgcu:7643: yathā stūpe udvidhyamāno na saṃśīryati tathā saṃvartya tamagārastūpe udvidhyet-uttareṇa yajuṣā'parameṣṭhyasī'tyanena ūrdhva vidhyet
GV06apastgcu:7647: āgrayaṇavacanādeva siddhe navānāmiti vacanamanāhitāgnernavānāṃ sthālīpāka eva yathā syāt /
GV06apastgcu:7650: tena śyāmākānāṃ veṇukānāṃ veṇuyavānāṃ cāgrayaṇaṃ anāhitāgnerbhavati //7//
GV06apastgcu:7653: navānāṃ vrīhīṇāṃ yavānāṃ vā sambandhināṃ patnyavahantītyādividhināsthālīpākamevaśrapayitvāgnerupasamādhānādyagnimukhānte kṛte
GV06apastgcu:7655: tatra prathamamindrāgnibhyāṃ agnīndrābhyāṃ vā svāheti juhoti /
GV06apastgcu:7663: na pradhānadevatā;āgrayaṇadevatābhya iti ca pradhānadevatānāmeva sampratyayaḥ;anyathā atiprasaṅgāt /
GV06apastgcu:7665: 'āgrayaṇaṃ bhavati hutādyāya'ityatrendrāgnyādadīnāmevopadeśāt aindrāgnasya mukhyapradhānatve cāmāvāsyātantramiti tantrani- yamasyopapatteḥ,
GV06apastgcu:7667: atra ca sviṣṭakṛccaturthābhya iti vacanaṃ śrautavadiha vrīhyāgrayaṇena śyāmākāgrayaṇasya pākṣikī samānatantratā mā bhūdityāvamartham /
GV06apastgcu:7671: ata eva nyāyāccharadi vrīhīṇāmāgrayaṇaṃ, vasante ca yavānāṃ parvaṇyeva /
GV06apastgcu:7672: kecit-sviṣṭakṛccaturthavacanāhitāgneḥ syāmākādīnāṃ veṇuyavānāṃ cāgrayaṇameva na bhavatīti /
GV06apastgcu:7684: tata odanena hutaśeṣeṇa piṇḍaṃ saṃvartayati yathā udvidyamāno na śīryati tathā sudṛḍhaṃ karoti /
GV06apastgcu:7685: tatastaṃ piṇḍamuttareṇa yajuṣā 'parameṣṭhyasi'ityanena udviddhet ūrdhva vikṣipet /
GV06apastgcu:7691: uttareṇa yajuṣā pratyavaruhyottarairdakṣiṇaiḥ pārśvaiḥ navasvastare saṃviśanti // ĀpGs_19.9 //
GV06apastgcu:7695: hemantapratyavarohaṇaṃ nāma karma nityaṃ saṃvatsare saṃvatsare kartavyam,
GV06apastgcu:7696: tadupadiśyate-hemante prāpte khaṭvāṃ vihāya palāśasvastare śete /
GV06apastgcu:7699: kaḥ punarasya kālaḥ? yasyāṃ vyuṣṭāyāṃ hemantaḥ pravartate śarannivartate, sā rātrirasya kālaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:7700: (apara āha-mārgaśīrṣyā paurṇamāsyāmastamite sthālīpākānte pratyavarohaṇaṃ sarvaṣāṃ prasiddhatvāditi /
GV06apastgcu:7702_1: palāśaiḥ kaspite śayanīye dakṣiṇaiḥ pārśvaiḥdakṣiṇāni pārśvānyadhaḥ kṛtvāsaṃviśantiśerate /
GV06apastgcu:7704: nityaseyaiva saṃveśanasya niyama- vidhirayam-niśāyāṃ yatsaṃveśanaṃ saṃvapnārtha tadasyāṃ niśāyāmeva kartavyamiti /
GV06apastgcu:7708: yasmin karmāṇi hemante svaṣṭvātaḥ pratyavarohaṇaṃ taddhemantapratyavarohaṇaṃ nāma karmopadiśyata iti śeṣaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:7709: asmādeva ca yaugikānnāmadheyāt 'pratyavarūḍo no hemantaḥ'iti mantraliṅgāccedaṃ karma hemante prathamāyāṃ rātrau kartavyamiti vidhiḥ kalpyate /
GV06apastgcu:7711_0: uttareṇa yajuṣā 'pratyavarūḍho no hemantaḥ'ityanena gṛhasthaḥ patnyādayaśca navasvastare
GV06apastgcu:7711_1: āruhya svaṣṭvāto hemante pratyavarohanti yāvaddhemantastāvatkhaṣṭvāṃ śayyāṃ vimucya
GV06apastgcu:7712: na punaḥ pūrvamadṛṣṭārtha khaṣṭvāmāruhya mantreṇa svastaraṃ pratyavarohantīti /
GV06apastgcu:7714: navasvastare navaiḥ palāśaiḥ kalpite śayanīye dakṣiṇaiḥ pārśvaiḥ
GV06apastgcu:7718: dakṣiṇataḥ pitottarā mātaivamavaśiṣṭānāṃ jyeṣṭho jyeṣṭho 'nantaraḥ // ĀpGs_19.10 //
GV06apastgcu:7722: teṣāṃ saṃviśatāṃ yaḥ pitā sa dakṣiṇaśśete yā mātā sottarā /
GV06apastgcu:7725: avaśiṣṭā amātyāsteṣāṃ yo yo jyeṣṭaḥ kumāraḥ kumārī vā sa piturdakṣiṇataḥ tadanantaro māturuttarataḥ /
GV06apastgcu:7726: tṛtīyaḥ prathamasya dakṣiṇataḥ caturtho dvitīyasyottarata ityādi /
GV06apastgcu:7728: sarve prākśrasaḥ udaṅmukhāḥ mantravidaśca mantrān japeyuḥ /
GV06apastgcu:7733: avaśiṣṭānāṃputrādīnāṃ madhye yo yo jyeṣṭhaḥ putro duhitā vā sa sa dakṣiṇo 'nantaraśca,
GV06apastgcu:7734: yo yaḥ kanīyān sa sa uttaro 'nantaraśca;evamityatideśāt /
GV06apastgcu:7736: yo dvitīyo jyeṣṭhassa sarvajyeṣṭhasya uttaro 'nantara ityādi /
GV06apastgcu:7743: evaṃ saṃviśya kiñcit suptvā saṃhāya sampūrvo jahatiḥ śayanāduttthāyāsane dṛṣṭaḥ 'kaliśśayāno bhavati saṃjihānastu dvāpara“iti /
GV06apastgcu:7746: atra ca mantroccāraṇaryogyānāmova, na tvamantravatāmapi vācanam //11//
GV06apastgcu:7751: evaṃ saṃveśanaṃ saṃhāyābhimarśanaṃ ca mantravat trirāvartanīyamityarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:7753: “udita āditye sauryāṇi svastyayanāni ca japitvānnaṃ saṃskṛtya brāhmaṇān bhojayitvā svastyayanaṃ vācayitve“(āśva.gṛ.4-6-18)
GV06apastgcu:7760: ucyate-naivātra saṃveśenaṃ vidhīyate, yenedamahni puṇyāhe syāt /
GV06apastgcu:7762: yadeva rāgaprāptaṃ rātrau saṃveśanaṃ tadāśratya mantrā niyamāśca vidhīyante;
GV06apastgcu:7764: yathā vā 'payasvatīroṣadhayaḥ iti purā barhiṣa āhartorjāyāpatī aśnītaḥ '(āpa.śrau.4-2-3) ityādi /
GV06apastgcu:7766: ante ca brāhmaṇabhojanam-'śucīn mantravatassarvakṛtyeṣu bhojayet'(āpa.dha.2-15-11) iti vacanāt //12//
GV06apastgcu:7767: atheśānabalirnāma nityaḥ pākayajño mantrāmnānakramaprāpto vyākhyāyate tasya ca sāmānyavidhisiddhodagayanādireva kālaḥ;
GV06apastgcu:7769: tataśca pratisaṃvatsaramidaṃ karma nāvartanīyam;sakṛtkṛte kṛtaśśāstrārthaḥ iti nyāyāt /
GV06apastgcu:7771: tathā śāstrāntarādeva gavāṃ śāntyarthaḥ putrādikāmārthaśca prayogaḥ pratyetavya iti /
GV06apastgcu:7774: īśānāya sthālīpākaṃ śrapayitvā kṣaitrapatyaṃ ca prācīmudīcīṃ vā diśamupaniṣkramya sthaṇḍilaṃ kalpayitvāgnerupasamādhānādi // ĀpGs_19.13 //
GV06apastgcu:7778: atha īśānabalirnāma pākayajño vakṣyate śūlagava iti yasya prasiddhiḥ gavālambhanaṃ ca tatra śāstrāntare
GV06apastgcu:7781: nityaścāyaṃ puruṣasaṃ skāraḥ na kāmyonaimittiko vā /
GV06apastgcu:7786: kaḥ punarasya kālaḥ?śaradi vasante veti śāstrāntaram /
GV06apastgcu:7791: tena yakṣyamāṇo gṛhe sthālīpākaṃ śrapayati aupāsane īśānāyadevāya saṅkalpitamekaṃ,
GV06apastgcu:7793_0: taissahaprācīmudīcīṃ vā diśaṃ grāmāt bahirupaniṣkramyayatra yakṣyamāṇo bhavati tatra
GV06apastgcu:7793_1: devayajanāya devagṛhayośca paryāptamekaṃ sthaṇḍilaṃ kalpayitvātasya pūrvārdhe aganyāyatanamullikhyāgniṃ
GV06apastgcu:7797: īśa aiśvarye“iti dhātvathesmṛteḥ niratiśayamaiśvarya yasya saīśānaḥpraṇavopāsanādibhirupāsyo maheśvara ityarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:7798: tasmai īśānāya sthālīpākaṃhomādibhyaḥ paryāptaṃ pārvaṇavadaupāsane śrapayitvā,
GV06apastgcu:7800: kecit-trīnodānān kalpayitvāgnimabhyānīya tato bahiḥ pratiṣṭhāpya trayāṇāmabhighāraṇamiti /
GV06apastgcu:7801: tenakṣaitrapatyaṃca sthālīpākaṃ laukikāgnau śrapayati, tasyānagnau pradeyatvāt /
GV06apastgcu:7802: atha yathārtha sambhārānādāya grāmātprācīmudīcīṃ vā diśamupaniṣkramyāgnikuṭyādibhyo 'laṃsthaṇḍilādi kalpayitvā,
GV06apastgcu:7811: tata agneḥ paścāt dve kuṭī karoti devāya devyai ca /
GV06apastgcu:7818: agnimukhānte kṛte apareṇāgniṃ dve kuṭī prāgdvāro udagaparge kṛtvā //14//
GV06apastgcu:7826: madhye jayaṃtasya pratikṛtimākāśa eva kṛtvā dakṣimasyāmīśānamāvāhayati uttarayarcā 'ā tvā vahanti'tyetayā /
GV06apastgcu:7827: agnerupasamādhānādīttyuktatvāt pradhānāhutīnāṃ ca vakṣyamāṇatvāt ājyabhāgānte kuṭīkaraṇameva bhavati //1//
GV06apastgcu:7838: uttarasyāṃ laukikyā vācā mīḍhuṣīṃ devīṃ āvāhayati /
GV06apastgcu:7845: tathottarasyāṃ kuṭyāṃlaukikyā vācā 'āyāhi mīḍhuṣi'iti mīḍhuṣīmīśānasya patnīṃ āvāhayatītyeva jaya karmāṇamindraṃ //2//
GV06apastgcu:7846: kuṭyormadhye ākāśe jayantamindrasūnuṃ skandaṃ vā 'āyāhi jayanta'ityāvāhayati /
GV06apastgcu:7849: yathoḍhamudakāni pradāya trīnodanān kalpayitvāgnimabhyānīyottaraikupasparśayitvā uttarairyathāsvamodanebhyo hutvā sarvatassamavadāyottareṇa yajuṣāgniṃ sviṣṭakṛtam // ĀpGs_20.4 //
GV06apastgcu:7853: (yena śabdena yeṣu sthāneṣu yena krameṇāvāhanaṃ coditaṃ taddevatākānyardhyāṇi prayacchati) /
GV06apastgcu:7855: īsānedaṃ te arghyam, jayantedaṃ te arghyamiti /
GV06apastgcu:7856: tato gandhapuṣpaghūpadīpairabhyarcya tataḥ sthālīpākāduddhṛtya trīnodanān kalpayati triṣu pātreṣu devyai skandāya ca devāya homārtha upahārārtha ca /
GV06apastgcu:7858: tatastānodanānagnisamīpamānīyyāpageṇāgniṃ barhiṣi pratiṣṭhāpayati dakṣiṇata uttaratomadhye ca /
GV06apastgcu:7865: yenaudanena yasyai devatāyai tvatvasambandha upasparśanenopalakṣitaḥ tasmāt tasya juhotītyarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:7869: evaṃ pradhānāhutīrhutvā tatassarvataḥ samavādāyottareṇa yajuṣāva 'agnaye sviṣṭakṛte suhuta'ityanenāgniṃ sviṣṭakṛtaṃyajati /
GV06apastgcu:7870: sarvatassamava- dāyettyucyate yathā svamodanebhyaḥ pṛthakpṛthak sviṣṭakṛnmābhūditi /
GV06apastgcu:7888: ityādibhissaptadaśabhiḥyathāsvamodanebhyaḥyo ya odano yasyā yasyā devatāyāssvabhūtastasmāttasmādyathāliṅgaṃ pārvaṇavadānadharmeṇāvadā- ya pradhānāhutīrjuhoti /
GV06apastgcu:7893: tatassarvatassarvebhyastribhya odanebhyaḥ sviṣṭakṛto 'vadānadharmeṇasamavadāya sahvadāyauttareṇa yajuṣā'agnaye sviṣṭakṛte suhuta huta'ityanenāgniṃ sviṣṭakṛtaṃjuhoti /
GV06apastgcu:7894: ataḥsarvatassamavadāyeti vacanaṃ āgrayaṇamāsiśrāddhādivat sakṛdevāvadāya sviṣṭakṛditi śahkānirāsārtham //4//
GV06apastgcu:7896: uttareṇa yajuṣopasthāyottaraissahaudanāni parṇānyekaikena dve dve datvā daśa devasenābhyo daśottarābhyaḥ // ĀpGs_20.5 //
GV06apastgcu:7900: uttareṇa yajuṣā'svastinaḥ pūrṇamukha'ityanena upasthānaṃ ca mahādevasya, tatpradhānatvātka4maṇaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:7905: tatra cāditassaptabhiḥ pratimantraṃ dve dve parṇedadāti /
GV06apastgcu:7906: aṣṭamena daśadevasenābhya iti vadan mantrapratītā devatā darśayati /
GV06apastgcu:7907: tatra gṛhapa iti mahādevābhidhānaṃ manyate gṛhān pātīti /
GV06apastgcu:7910: gṛbapī devī, tasmādanena mantreṇa devyai dātavyaṃ tasyā evaudanāt /
GV06apastgcu:7915: deśottarābhyaḥ “yā ākhyātā” ityasminnuttare mantre pratītā uttarā devatāḥ /
GV06apastgcu:7916: tābhyo dhaśa parmāni tenaiva mantreṇa devasyaivaudanāt //4//
GV06apastgcu:7919: uttareṇa yajuṣā'svasti naḥ pūrṇamukha'ityanena agnimīśānaṃ vo pariṣṭhate /
GV06apastgcu:7923: tato yathāsvamodanebhya eva yājñiyeṣuparṇānyuttaraiḥ'gṛhapopaspṛśa'ityādibhissaptabhirdadātīti sāmānyena vidhāya viśinaṣṭiekaikenamantreṇadve dveparṇe iti /
GV06apastgcu:7926: tābhyo daśa parṇāni dakṣiṇasyāṃ kuṭyāṃ devasyaivaudanādavadāya dadāti /
GV06apastgcu:7928: uttarasmin mantre 'yā ākyātā yāścānākhyātā'iti guṇadvayavatyastā uttarā devasenāḥ //5//
GV06apastgcu:7933: pūrvavaduttarairmantraiḥ 'dvārāpospṛśe'tyādibhiḥ caturbhiḥ parmāni deyānipūrvavadekaikena dve dve ityarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:7941: pūrva yathā 'gṛhapopaspṛśa'ityādibhirdakṣiṇettarakuṭyormadhye ca svebhya evaudanebhyo dve dve parṇe pratimantraṃ datte,
GV06apastgcu:7954: tasyāmeva tataḥ punarapi tatraiva 'dvārāpopaspṛśa'iti dve parṇe /
GV06apastgcu:7957: atra yadyapi kecana mantrā avyaktaliṅgakā bahuvacanaliṅgakāśca,
GV06apastgcu:7962: ityatra tu sūtrakāravacanāddevasyeśānasya senā devasenā eva devatāḥ /
GV06apastgcu:7964: putrādipūjāyāṃ satyāṃ pitrāderahameva pūjita iti mānasapratyakṣodayāt /
GV06apastgcu:7968: tena gṛhapeti devāya; 'rudraḥ khalu vai vāstoṣpatiḥ'(tai.saṃ.3-4-10) iti śruteḥ /
GV06apastgcu:7978: odanapiṇḍaṃ saṃvṛtya parṇapuṭe 'vadhāyottareṇa yajuṣā vṛkṣa āsajati // ĀpGs_20.7 //
GV06apastgcu:7982: atha tasyaivodanāt piṇḍaṃ ubhābyāṃ hastābyāṃsaṃvṛtyadṛḍhaṃ kṛtvā parṇaissyūtaiḥ kṛte puṭe 'vadhāyataṃ śikye
GV06apastgcu:7983: kṛtvottareṇa yajuṣā 'namo niṣaṅgiṇa iṣudhimate, ityanena vṛkṣaāsajatiavasambayati //6//
GV06apastgcu:7986: atha homabaliśeṣebhyaḥ tribhyaḥ odanebhya upādāyapiṇḍaṃsaṃvartayati sudṛḍhaṃ karoti /
GV06apastgcu:7989: tatastaṃ piṇḍaṃ parmapuṭe 'vadhāyottareṇa yajuṣā 'namo niṣaṅgiṇa iṣudhimate'ityetāvataiva mantrasamāmnāyagatena vṛkṣe kasmiścidāsajati śikye
GV06apastgcu:7996: atra asminkāle rudrān 'namaste rudra manyava“ityādīnekādaśānuvākān japet /
GV06apastgcu:7999_0: antatastrayo mantrāḥ 'namorudrebhyo ye pṛthivyāṃ yeṣāmannamiṣavaḥ''namo rudrebhyo
GV06apastgcu:7999_1: ye 'ntarikṣe yeṣāṃ vātaḥ''namo rudrebhyo ye divi yeṣāṃ varṣamiṣavastebhyaḥ'ityādi
GV06apastgcu:8006_0: tathā 'namo rudrebhyo ye pṛthivyāṃ yeṣāmannamiṣavastebhyaḥ''namo rudrebhyo ye 'ntarikṣe

GV06apastgcu:8017: abhita etamagniṃ gāssthāpayati yathainā dhūmaḥ prāpnuyāt // ĀpGs_20.10 //
GV06apastgcu:8021: etaṃhūyamānamagnimabhito gāḥātmīyāḥ yathāsthāpayatisthāpane enā gāḥ dhūmaḥ prāpnuyāt /
GV06apastgcu:8037: tatra homa kālavacanaṃ prokṣaṇaṃ tasmin kāle //10//
GV06apastgcu:8039: yadyapyasāvupakrame na tiṣṭhet tathāpi ahgatvāt tasyaivāvokṣaṇam /
GV06apastgcu:8052: gavāṃ marge 'nagnau kṣetrasya patiṃ yajate // ĀpGs_20.12 //
GV06apastgcu:8058: gavāmapagacchantīnāṃ kasyāścit goḥ pathi yāgavidhānāt agnau prāpte pratiṣedhaḥ //12//
GV06apastgcu:8075: caturṣu saptasu vā parṇeṣu nāmādeśaṃ dadhāti // ĀpGs_20.14 //
GV06apastgcu:8079: āvāhyārghya datvā gandhādibhirabhyarcya sthālīpākamāsādyābhighārya catvāri sapta vā parṇāni devasya samīpe kṛtvā
GV06apastgcu:8081: tatra pūrveṣu parmadānamantreṣu svāhākārāntatvaniyamāt ihāpi kṣetrasya pataye svāheti parṇadānam /
GV06apastgcu:8085: catvāri sapta vā parmāni bhūmau sthāpayitvā teṣu kṣaitrapatyāt sthālīpākādodanamādāyanāmadeśaṃnāma caturthyantamādiśya 'kṣetrasya pataye tvāṃ dadāmi, itidadhāti /
GV06apastgcu:8089: atra tu na sahaudanāni parmāni deyāni;parṇeṣviti saptamīnirdeśāt //14//
GV06apastgcu:8095: pāko bālastadvat gamanaśīlo 'yaṃ devaḥ tasmācchīghraṃ yajetetyarthaḥ //15//
GV06apastgcu:8098: ayaṃ caudanadānātmako yāgaḥ kṣipramāvāhanānantaramudakameva pradāya kartavyaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:8099: gandhādipradānaṃ tu yāgottarakālameva;yataḥ pākaṃ alpo devaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:8100: etaduktaṃ bhavati-anityadarsanatvāt kṣetrasya pateḥ śagrimeva balirdeya iti /
GV06apastgcu:8122: ayaṃ ca prākṛtapratipattyanuvādo brāhmaṇabahutvaṃ vidhātum, sarpiṣmattvaṃ nivartayituṃ vā //17//
GV06apastgcu:8125: kṣaitrapatyaṃ prāśnanti ye sanābhayo bhavanti // ĀpGs_20.18 //
GV06apastgcu:8130: sanābhaya ityeva siddheye bhavanti iti vacanaṃ dauhitrādīnāmapi sambandhināṃ pratigrahārtham //18//
GV06apastgcu:8138: eṣāṃ yajamānakulajātānāṃ yathākuladhrbaḥtathā vā prāśanam-yadi putrāṇāmeva, tathā prāśanam /
GV06apastgcu:8141: ityanākulāyāṃ haradattamiśraviracitāyāṃ gṛhyavṛttau viṃśaḥ khaṇḍaḥ saptamaśca paṭalaḥ //
GV06apastgcu:8144: yadyeṣāmanuṣṭhātṝṇāṃ asapiṇḍakartṛkaprāśanamapi kuladharmastarhi tathā vā syāt //19//
GV06apastgcu:8154: punarapi pākayajñāntaraṃ puruṣatrayasampradānakaṃ tādṛśānāmaṣṭakādīnāṃ prakṛtibhūtaṃ māsiśrāddhasaṃjñikaṃ pitryaṃ karmopadiśyate--
GV06apastgcu:8161: māsiśrāddhaṃnāma pitryaṃ karma māsi māsi kartavyam /
GV06apastgcu:8164: niti ca te sarve yathopadeśaṃyathā tatropadiṣṭāḥ tathaiva māsi māsi pratyetavyāḥ /
GV06apastgcu:8165: yadyapi te viśeṣāḥ tasmādeva vacanāt siddhāḥ tathāpi tasya karmaṇaḥ prayogavidhānamita uttaraṃ kriyata iti jñāpanārthamidaṃ vacanam /
GV06apastgcu:8166: anyathā jñāpayeta śucīn mantravataḥ ityādi kasmin karmaṇi vidhīyata iti /
GV06apastgcu:8169: tena pūrvasmin pakṣe pañcadaśyāmakṛtaśrāddhasyāparasmin pakṣe prathamādiṣu sarvāsu tithiṣu kriyābhavati tattatkā-masya //1//
GV06apastgcu:8179: kecit-yasyāṃ tithau prathamamupakramastasyāmevottare prayoga iti niyamo nāsti;
GV06apastgcu:8180: kunti pūrṇe 'pi māse aparapakṣa eva yathopadeśaṃ tithyantare 'pi nityaḥ kāmyaśca prayoga iti //1//
GV06apastgcu:8195: anādye āmaśrāddhe durbhikṣe vā kule ekamapi bhojaye- dityarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:8196: yadyapi strībhyo 'pi piṇḍadānaṃ dṛśyate tathāpi brāhmaṇabhojanamiha tabhyo na bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:8200: ekaikasmai trayaḥ pañca vā, kalpāntare dharmaśāstreṣu ca darśanāt /
GV06apastgcu:8218: nanu-sāmayācārikeṣveva brahmaṇānāṃ mantravattvaṃ yonigotramantrāsambandhatvaṃ va siddham;
GV06apastgcu:8220: ucyate-nitye māsiśrāddhe gṛhyoktaguṇānapi bhojayet nāvaśyaṃ dharmoktān brahmavidontevāsyasambandhānityevamartham /
GV06apastgcu:8224: tataśca pitrādīnāṃ trayāṇāṃ pratyakaṃ trīn pañca vā na punassaptādīn,
GV06apastgcu:8238: aṣṭakāsu ca vṛddhau ca gayāyāṃ ca mṛte 'hani /
GV06apastgcu:8241: iha ca sūtrakārabhāṣyakārābyāmanuktamapi viśvadevārtha yugmānāṃ bhojanaṃ kartavyam 'dvau daive'iti manuyājñavaklyābhyāmuktatvāt,
GV06apastgcu:8246: yadā tveka eva brāhmaṇo labhyate, tadā taṃ pitrādyarthameva bhojayet, pradhānatvāt /
GV06apastgcu:8247: aṅgabhūtasya tu vaiśvadevasya yadyekaṃ bhojayecchrāddhe daivaṃ tatra kathaṃ bhavet /
GV06apastgcu:8248: annaṃ pātre samuddhṛtya sarvasya prakṛtasya ca //
GV06apastgcu:8263: iti yājñavalkyaviṣṇusmṛtyoḥ viṣṇupurāṇe ca vidhidarśanāt mātāmahaśrāddhamapi nityamevāvagamyate /
GV06apastgcu:8265: ucyate-naiva tatrāpi smṛtyantareṣu pitryavatsarvasyaiva jīvato dvijasyāvaśyaṃ mātāmahaśrāddhamapi niyamena kartavyamiti vidhitsitam /
GV06apastgcu:8268: kasya tarhi niyamena kartavyamiti vidhiriti cet;
GV06apastgcu:8269: yaḥ putrikākṛtāyā āsurādivivāho- ḍhāyā vā putro mātāmahena saha mātussāpiṇḍyaṃ karoti,
GV06apastgcu:8274: atha vā yo dauhitro 'putrasya mātāmahasyākhilārtahārī tasyaitacchrāddhaṃ niyatam /
GV06apastgcu:8284: tasmāt sarvasya dhauhitrasya pitryavat kartavyameveti niyamābhāvatsūtrakārabhāṣyakārau na brūtaḥ // 2 //
GV06apastgcu:8313: na tu bahumantraka eko homaḥ, 'etadvā viparītam'(āpa.gṛ.21-5) iti bahutvaliṅgāt /
GV06apastgcu:8315: atra prathamadvitīyayormantrayoramiṣmā ityasya sthāne viṣṇuśarmaṇa iti caturthyā piturnāmagrahaṇam /
GV06apastgcu:8320: ata eva prakṛtau darśapūrṇamāsayoranekapatnīkasyāpi 'patnī sannahya'ityekavacanenaiva sampraiṣaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:8324: jīvapitrādikastu pitrādeḥ pitrādīnāṃ trayāṇāṃ mṛtānāṃ nāmāni gṛhṇāti /
GV06apastgcu:8329: tattatpratiyopinirdeśapūrvakaḥ 'pituḥ pitā vṛhktām'pituḥ pitāmaho vṛṅktām'ityādikaḥ prayogaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:8330: na ca jīvapitrādikasya māsiśrīddhaṃ nāstītyāśaṅkanīyam, dhriyamāṇe tu pitari pūrvaṣāmeva ni4vapet /
GV06apastgcu:8336: maivam; pitā yasya tu vṛttassyājjīveccāpi pitāmahaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:8340: tataśca vyutkramācceti niṣedhaḥ pākṣika iti niścayādadhikāro 'pi pākṣiko 'vigamyate //3//
GV06apastgcu:8347: tatra 'svāhā pitra'; iti purastāt svāhākāratvānnānte svāhākāraḥ /
GV06apastgcu:8348: atrāhuḥ māsiśrāddhe brāhmaṇabhojanaṃ pradhānakarmatadaṅgamagnau karaṇaṃ piṇḍaśca /
GV06apastgcu:8353: homasya bhojanāṅgatvāt piṇḍapitṛyajñe tu homasya pradhānatvāditi /
GV06apastgcu:8354: anye tu yebhya eva pitā dadhyāt tebhya eva putro 'pītyāhuḥ /
GV06apastgcu:8355: apara āha trīṇi śrāddhe pradhānāni-agnau karaṇaṃ bhojanaṃ piṇḍadānamiti tenā 'homāt kṛtvā virame'dityasyāpi vidherayaṃ viṣaya iti
GV06apastgcu:8365: prayogaḥ-pūrvadyurnivedanaṃ sāyaṃ bhojanānantaraṃ śvaḥ śrāddhaṃ bhaviṣyatīti /
GV06apastgcu:8367: (vayaṃ tu brūmaḥ pūrvedyuḥ sāyaṃ bhojanaṃ na bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:8369: athāparedyuḥ prātaḥ dvatīyaṃ nivedanam-adya kriyata iti /
GV06apastgcu:8372: pūrva viśvebhyo devebhyo yajñopavītī yugmān dvau caturo vā 'māsi śrāddhe viśvebhyo devebhyaḥ kṣaṇaḥ kartavya'iti /
GV06apastgcu:8377: pitṛbhya udaṅmukhāḥ dviguṇabhugneṣu dakṣiṇāgreṣu yuvānaḥ pitre /
GV06apastgcu:8381: śucaudeśe dakṣiṇāpravaṇe śrāddhāgāraṃ sarvataḥ pariśritamudagavādvāraṃ tasya pūrvottare deśe agniraupāsanaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:8383: tasya dakṣiṇataḥ udaṅmukhāḥ pitrārthāḥ paścāt prāṅmukhāḥ devārthāḥ /
GV06apastgcu:8384: tasminneva sthaṇḍile yathāvakāśaṃ triṣu pātreṣu pitṛbhya udakānyarghyāṇi dakṣiṇāpavargāṇi tilavanti /
GV06apastgcu:8386: tāni puṣpairavakīryadarbheṣu sādayitvā darbhaiḥ pracchādya āsanagatānāṃ barāhmaṇānāṃ hasteṣu
GV06apastgcu:8387: svasmātsvasmāt udapātrāt pātrāntaremāpa ādāya 'visve devā idaṃ vor'ghya'; 'pitaḥ idaṃ ter'ghya,
GV06apastgcu:8391: purastādupariṣṭācca śuddhodakam tato gandhādibhiḥ vāsobhiśca dvijānabhyarcya /
GV06apastgcu:8394: tato brāhmaṇārtha saṃskṛtādannāduddhṛtyāpareṇāgniṃ bahirṣi pratiṣṭhāpyābhighāryāgnerupasamādhānādyajyabhāgānte trayodaśa pradhānāhutīrjuhoti //5//
GV06apastgcu:8405: evaṃ pradhānāhutīrhutvā sauviṣṭakṛtaṃ hutvā jayādi pratipadyate /
GV06apastgcu:8408: pariṣecanāntaṃ kṛtvā praṇītāśca vimucya tatassarvamannaṃ hoṣyaṃ ca samupanidhāya hutaśeṣaṃ ca tasman utsṛjya tamuttairastribhiḥ abhimṛśet
GV06apastgcu:8414: atha brāhmaṇabhojanārthahaviṣyamahaviṣayaṃ ca sarvamannaṃ uttaraiḥ 'eṣa te tata madhumān'ityetaistribhirmantraiḥ abhimṛśet /
GV06apastgcu:8420: atha vā bhojanapātreṣu kḷptānodanaviśeṣān pratipuruṣaṃ pṛthagabhimṛśet yathāliṅgam /
GV06apastgcu:8421: tatra yāvantaḥ pitrarthe bhojayante tāvatsu prathamasya mantrasyāvṛttiḥ 'evamuttarayoḥ- /
GV06apastgcu:8425: athavā -pitrādyarthebhyo brāhmaṇebhyaḥ pratirūrūṣaṃ bhojanapātreṣu kḷptān prakaspitān bhojayapadārthān ekaikena mantreṇa yathāliṅga mabhimṛśet /
GV06apastgcu:8426: atrāpi pitrāderekaikasya brāhmaṇabahutve yugapadabhimarśanāsambhave ca tattanmantrāvṛttiḥ //7//
GV06apastgcu:8432: uttareṇa yajuṣā 'pṛthivī te pātra'mityanena brāhmaṇaiḥ sparśayitvā bhojayediti śeṣaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:8434: 'maiṣāṃ kṣeṣṭhāḥ'iti bahutvaṃ dṛśyate tathāpi pratipuruṣaṃ mantrāvṛttiḥ uparavamantravat ,
GV06apastgcu:8436: tatra pūrva devānāmupasparśanaṃ 'viśve devāsa'; ityanayarcā, smṛtyantare darśanāt /
GV06apastgcu:8441: rakṣoghnān pitryān vaiṣṇavyānanyāṃśca pavitrān dharmyān mantrān dharmaśāstra mitihāsapurāṇāṃścābhiśrāvayati /
GV06apastgcu:8442: tatastṛptāni jñātvā madhumatīḥ śrāvayet akṣannamīmadanteti ca /
GV06apastgcu:8443: atha bhūmāvannaṃ vikarati-'ye agnidagdhā ye 'nagnigdhā ye vā jātāḥ kule mama /
GV06apastgcu:8444: bhūmau dattena piṇaḍena tṛptā yāntu parāṃ gati'miti /
GV06apastgcu:8445: athācānteṣu punarapo datvā 'svadita'miti pitrartān vācayati 'rocata'iti vāśvadevārtān /
GV06apastgcu:8446: tato yathāśraddhaṃ dakṣiṇāṃ datvā sarvebhyo 'nnaśeṣebhyaḥ piṇḍārtha prāśanārthañcoddhṛtya śeṣaṃ nivedayot-annaśeṣaiḥ kiṃ kriyatāṃ iti /
GV06apastgcu:8449: śraddhā ca no mā vyapagāt bahudeyaṃ ca no 'stu'; //
GV06apastgcu:8455: tatra sarvakarmaṇāṃ vaiśvadeveṣu pūrva pravṛttiḥ paścāt pitryeṣu /
GV06apastgcu:8464: atra ca mantre yadyapi brāhmaṇānāmiti bahuvacanaṃ tatāpi yugapat sparsāyitumaśakyatvāt pratipūruṣaṃ mantrāvṛttiḥ,
GV06apastgcu:8469_0: bhuktavato 'nuvrajya pradakṣiṇīkṛtya dvaidhaṃ dakṣiṇāgrān darbhān saṃstīrya teṣūttarairapo
GV06apastgcu:8469_2: triḥprasavyaṃ pariṣicya nyubjya pātrāṇyuttaraṃ yajuranavānaṃ tryavarārghyamāvartayitvā
GV06apastgcu:8469_3: prokṣyapātrāṇi dvandvamabhyudāhṛtya sarvatassamavadāyottareṇa yajuṣā śeṣasya grāsavarārghya
GV06apastgcu:8473: tatastānbhuktavato 'nuvrajya pradīkṣaṇīkṛtyapratyāvṛtya prācīnāvītī piṇḍapradānadeśe dakṣiṇāgrān darbhān
GV06apastgcu:8475: tatra pitṛbhyaḥ purastāt stṛmāti, mātṛbhyaḥ paścāt /
GV06apastgcu:8482: piṇḍaṃ pūrvavat dadāti piṇḍapitṛyajñe yat piṇḍadānaṃ tadityarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:8485: evamapo datvā tata uttarairmantraiḥ 'etatte tatāsā'vityādibhisteṣu darbheṣūbhayeṣudakṣiṇāpavargān piṇḍān dadāti yathāliṅgaṃ pitṛbhyaśca mātṛbhyaśca /
GV06apastgcu:8487: atrāpi pūrvavadityasya sabandhāt savyaṃ jānvācyāvācīnapāṇirityādi vidhānamihāpi bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:8489: 'etadvāṃ tatau yajñaśarmaviṣṇuśarmāṇau ye ca yuvāmanu, 'etadvāṃ pitāmahā'- vityādi /
GV06apastgcu:8490: etadvāṃ mātarāvasau yāśca yuvāmanu'ityādidakṣiṇāpavargānityucyate-ubhayeṣāṃ piṇḍānāṃ pṛthak dakṣiṇāpavargatā yathā syāditi /
GV06apastgcu:8491: tena pitṛpiṇḍānāṃ dakṣiṇato mātṛpiṇḍā na bhavanti /
GV06apastgcu:8493: evaṃ piṇḍān datvā pūrvavaduttarairapo dadāti pitṛbhyaśca mātṛbhyaśca /
GV06apastgcu:8494_0: mantrasamāmnāye'mārjantāṃ mama pitara ityete'iti mantrāṇāṃ punarādiṣṭatvāt 'uttarairapo
GV06apastgcu:8494_1: datvā'ityeva siddhe pūrvavadityatidśaḥ piṇḍapitṛyajñapratyavamarśanārthaḥ -piṇḍeṣu codakāñjaliṣu ca /
GV06apastgcu:8495: tata uttarairmantraiḥ tānupatiṣṭhate yathāliṅgaṃ 'ye ca vo 'treti pitṝn,
GV06apastgcu:8496: yāśca ve 'treti mātṝ;te ca vahantāmiti pitṛn,
GV06apastgcu:8501: tata uttarayarcā 'putrān pautrānityetayātriḥ prasavyamudapātreṇa pimḍān pariṣiñcati . ubhayāstaparyantviti lṅgāt piṇḍānāṃ sahapariṣecanam /
GV06apastgcu:8503: prasavyavacanamanuvādaḥ prasavyaṃ triguṇībhūtamekameva pariṣecanaṃ santataṃ yathā syāt,
GV06apastgcu:8505: evaṃ pariṣicya tataḥ pātrāṇi yānyatra prakṛtāni trīṇyarghyapātrāṇi pariṣecanapātrāmudakumbhaḥ
GV06apastgcu:8506_0: yasmin piṇḍārthamannamuddhṛtaṃ tacceti tāninyubjyanyāñci kṛtvā tata uttaraṃ yajuḥ
GV06apastgcu:8513: evamabhyudāhṛtya śeṣasyānnasyagrāsavarārghya grāso 'varārdhyo avamā mātrā yasya tatgrāsavarārdhyamchāndaso hrasvaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:8514: tatprāśnīyāt uttareṇa yajuṣā'prāṇe niviṣṭo 'mṛtaṃ juhomi'ityanenasarvatassarvabhyaḥ śrāddhaśeṣebhya annaśeṣebhya ityarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:8528: atha pratyetya prācīnāvītī piṇḍadānadeśe dakṣiṇāgrān darbhān, dvaidhaṃdveghā saṃstṛṇāti /
GV06apastgcu:8530_0: tatasteṣu darbeṣūttaraiḥ 'mārjayantāṃ mama mātaraḥ'ityādibhiśca yathārha dakṣiṇāpavargamapo
GV06apastgcu:8532: atra pūrveṣu triṣu mantreṣvasāvi- tyasya sthāne pitṛpitāmahaprapitāmahānāṃ nāmāni sambuddyā yathākramaṃ gṛhṇāti /
GV06apastgcu:8536: piṇḍadāna eva dakṣiṇāpavargaḥ'dvaidhaṃ darbāstaraṇeṣu tu paścimāpavarga iti jñāpanārtham,
GV06apastgcu:8539_1: padamapakṛṣya triṣvapi sūtreṣu codyamānaṃ pūrvavat piṇḍapitṛyajñavatkartavyamiti vyācakṣate /
GV06apastgcu:8544: yadi tvācārabalāt 'savyaṃ jānvācya'ityādīhāpi kartavyamevetyucyeta, tadā na kaściddoṣaḥ

GV06apastgcu:8570: kṛtaprāṇāyāmaḥ śvo māsiśrāddhaṃ kartāsmīti saṅkalpya śucitvādiguṇasampannebhyaḥ śvitrādidoṣavarjitebhyaḥ kṛtasāyamāhnikebhyo brāhmaṇebhyo nivedayet /

GV06apastgcu:8710: yā māghyāḥ paurṇamāsyā uparidvyahyaṣṭakā tasyāmaṣṭamī jyeṣṭhayā sampadyate tāmekāṣṭaketyācakṣate // ĀpGs_21.10 //

GV06apastgcu:8716_1: ityācakṣatesā yadijyeṣṭhayā sampadyatesaṅgacchate tāmapyekāṣṭaketyācakṣate iti dvāvimau yogau /

GV06apastgcu:8748: tasyāḥekāṣṭakāyāḥ samīpe yatkarma kriyate pūrvedyussaptamyām, tatracatuśśarāvamapūpaṃ śrapayati /

GV06apastgcu:8765: na tviha tasyā aṣṭakāyā iti sambandhaḥ navamyāṃ vapāhomādi pradhānaprasaṅgāt /

GV06apastgcu:8798: pratiṣṭhitābhidhāraṇānte kṛte agnerupasamādhājyabhāgāntaṃ kṛtvā pārvaṇavadavadānakalpenāpūpāduttarayarcā añjalinā juhoti 'yāṃ janāḥ pratinandantī'tyetayā /

GV06apastgcu:9514: yadi vā vayaḥ pakṣī pakṣābhyāmenamabhivikṣipetupari pakṣavātena dhunuyāt,
GV06apastgcu:9515: yadivā avarṣatarkye abhraśūnye nabhasi tasmāddindurapāṃ stokaḥ abhinipatot, vyākhyātam /
GV06apastgcu:9520: yathāliṅgamiti tu vacanamekaikasminnimitte tribhistribhiḥ prakṣālanaṃ mā bhūditi //9//
GV06apastgcu:9523_0: āgārasthūṇāvirohaṇe madhuna upaveśane kuptvāṃ kapotapadadarśane 'mātyānāṃ śarīrareṣaṇe
GV06apastgcu:9538: kapotasya pakṣiṇa āraṇyasyapadadarśane pacanāgāre tasmin praviṣṭa ityarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:9544: naikasya dvayorvā reṣaṇe kālabhede ca na bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:9545: atra prāyaścittam-amāvāsyāthāṃ niśāyāṃ caturdhāvibhaktāyāṃ rātreḥ dvatīyo bhāgo nśā /
GV06apastgcu:9546: yatra pradeśe apāṃ kumbhairudadhāneṣvānīyamānānāṃ śabdaṃ na śṛṇuyāt tatra pradeśe 'gnerupasamādhānādyuttarā āhutaya ekādaśa imaṃ me varuṇa ityādayaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:9549: prajāpate natvaditi cahutvā pradhānahurtārjuhuyāt iti tantraśeṣaṃ pratipadyate /
GV06apastgcu:9550: ājyabhāgānta ityevaṃ tantrasamāptau siddhāyāṃ agnerupamādhānādivacanaṃ agnimātrasyopasamādhānārtham /
GV06apastgcu:9552: evaṃprakārāṇāmeteṣāṃ naimittikānāṃ dṛṣṭaphalānāṃ ca paṇyahomādīnāṃ anyasminnapyagnau pravṛttipradarśanārtha sarvānte agnividhānārtho yatnaḥ kṛtaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:9555: na sūtrāntaradṛśṭā āhutayo 'smin tantre hotavyāḥ iti /
GV06apastgcu:9556: kāḥ punastāḥ?kapotaścedagāramupahanyādanupatedvā devāḥ kapotaḥ iti pratyṛcaṃ juhuyāt japedvā /
GV06apastgcu:9560: tadapi prāyaścittaṃ vikalpena bhavati pṛthaktantra iti /
GV06apastgcu:9566: utpātā iti tu ūrdhva bhavanti anyaktāvasthāyāṃ prāpnunuvanti /
GV06apastgcu:9569: tatra divyā utpātā rātrāvindradhanu rādityakīla ityādayaḥ bhaumāṃstvadbhutānagārasthūṇetyādinā svayamevodāharati /
GV06apastgcu:9579: ekapātrabhojanāḥ putrabhrātrādayaḥ teṣāṃ bahūnāṃ santataṃśarīrareṣaṇeśarīranāśane maraṇa ityarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:9581: anyeṣu cādubhutotpāteṣuuktebhyo 'nyeṣu gṛhamadhye valmīkajananādiṣvadibhuteṣu usāteṣu ca dṛṣeṣu satsu tatsūcitaduritaśāntyādikāmo 'māvāsyāyāṃniśāyāṃ rātryāṃmuhūrtadvayādūrdhvam /
GV06apastgcu:9585: tantravidhānaṃ cāsya ājyahaviṣṭvāt . ājyabāgānte iti tvarthakṛtyapratiṣedhārtham /
GV06apastgcu:9586: uttarā āhutīḥ 'imaṃ me varuṇa, tatvāyāmi'ityekādaśāhutīrhutvā vacanabalājjayādi pratipadyate /
GV06apastgcu:9587: atra prajāpati iti pratīkena 'prājāpatyā vyāhṛtīḥ'itivat 'prajāpate na tvadetāni'ityeṣaiva gṛhyate //9//
GV06apastgcu:9588: pariṣecanāntaṃ kṛtvābhimṛtebhya uttarayā dakṣiṇato 'śmānaṃ paridhiṃ dadhāti dadhāti // ĀpGs_23.10 //
GV06apastgcu:9591_0: ata amātyānāṃ śarīrareṣaṇe ityasminnadbhute kaścidviśeṣaḥ yeṣāṃ pūrvāparā anvañcaḥ
GV06apastgcu:9591_1: pramīyante te abhimṛtāstebhyastadartha teṣāṃ mṛtyuśamanārtha uttaraṃ karma homamimaṃ
GV06apastgcu:9591_2: kṛtvā pariṣecanānte 'śmānaṃ paridhi antardhānaṃ mṛttyunivāraṇārtha pratiṣṭhāpayatiuttarayarcā
GV06apastgcu:9593: paridhimiti vacanāt tasyāśmanaḥ pracyāvanaṃ na kāryam, tatraiva pratiṣṭhito bhavati //10//
GV06apastgcu:9607: abhimṛtāabhimukhyena mṛtā yogyatayā jīvanta eva amātyānāṃ santatamaraṇadarśanena svayamapi maraṇādbhītā ityarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:9618: iti śrīsudarśanācāryaviracite gṛhyatātparyadarśane trayoviṃśaḥ khamḍaḥ asṭamaśca paṭalassamāptaḥ //
